tika-s0403t:505_18: Na attanā paribhuñjati “mayhaṃ asādhāraṇabhogitā mā hotū”ti.
tika-s0403t:505_20: passatīti iminā āgamanato paṭṭhāya sādhāraṇabuddhiṃ upaṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0403t:506_1: passatīti iminā tassa lābhassa tīsu kālesu sādhāraṇato ṭhapanaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-s0403t:506_2: Paṭiggaṇhanto ca saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti iminā paṭiggahaṇakālo dassito.
tika-s0403t:506_5: Tadubhayaṃ pana tādisena pubbabhāgena vinā na hotīti atthasiddho purimakālo.
tika-s0403t:506_6: Tayidaṃ paṭiggahaṇato pubbevassa hoti “saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti paṭiggaṇhissāmī”ti,
tika-s0403t:506_8: paṭiggahetvā hoti “saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti hi paṭiggahitaṃ mayā”ti.
tika-s0403t:506_9: Evaṃ tilakkhaṇasampannaṃ katvā laddhaṃ lābhaṃ osāraṇalakkhaṇaṃ avikopetvā paribhuñjanto sādhāraṇabhogī appaṭivibhattabhogī ca hoti.
tika-s0403t:507_0: Imaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammanti imaṃ catutthaṃ saritabbayuttadhamaṃ. Na hi…pe… gaṇhanti,
tika-s0403t:507_1: tasmā sādhāraṇabhogitā dussīlassa natthīti ārambhopi tāva na sambhavati,
tika-s0403t:507_4: Vattaṃ akhaṇḍentoti iminā appaṭivibhattabhogitaṃ sādhāraṇabhogitañca dasseti.
tika-s0403t:507_5: Sati pana tadubhaye sāraṇīyadhammo pūrito eva hotīti āha “pūretī”ti.
tika-s0403t:507_6: Odissakaṃ katvāti etena anodissakaṃ katvā pituno,
tika-s0403t:507_7: ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ vā therāsanato paṭṭhāya dentassa sāraṇīyadhammoyeva hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0403t:507_9: Sāraṇīyadhammo panassa na hoti paṭijaggaṭṭhāne odissakaṃ katvā dinnattā.
tika-s0403t:507_12: Yadi evaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ sāraṇīyadhammaṃ pūrentassa odissakadānaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0403t:507_14: No na vaṭṭati yuttaṭṭhāneti dassento “tena panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t:507_15: Iminā odissakadānaṃ panassa na sabbattha vāritanti dasseti.
tika-s0403t:507_16: Gilānādīnañhi odissakaṃ katvā dānaṃ appaṭivibhāgapakkhikaṃ “asukassa na dassāmī”ti paṭikkhepassa abhāvato.
tika-s0403t:507_23: tasmā dussīlassapi atthikassa sati sambhave dātabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:508_2: Idāni tassa kosallaṃ dassetuṃ “susikkhitāya hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:508_4: na tato oranti iminā tassa duppūrataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0403t:508_5: Tathā hi so mahapphalo mahānisaṃso diṭṭhadhammikehipi tāvagarutarehi phalānisaṃsehi anugatoti taṃsamaṅgī
tika-s0403t:508_6: ca puggalo visesalābhī ariyapuggalo viya loke acchariyabbhutadhammasamannāgato hoti.
tika-s0403t:508_7: Tathā hi so duppajahadānamayassa sīlamayassa puññassa paṭipakkhadhammaṃ sudūre vikkhambhitaṃ katvā visuddhena
tika-s0403t:508_8: cetasā loke pākaṭo paññāto hutvā viharati.
tika-s0403t:508_9: Tassimamatthaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca vibhāvetuṃ “sace hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:509_0: Idānissa samparāyike diṭṭhadhammike ca ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “evaṃ pūritasāraṇīyadhammassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:509_1: Neva issā na macchariyaṃ hoti cirakālabhāvanāya vidhutabhāvato.
tika-s0403t:509_3: Tenāha “dadaṃ piyo hoti bhajanti naṃ bahū”tiādi.
tika-s0403t:509_4: Sulabhapaccayo hoti dānavasena uḷārajjhāsayānaṃ paccayalābhassa idhānisaṃsasabhāvato dānassa.
tika-s0403t:509_5: Pattagatamassa diyyamānaṃ na khīyati pattagatasseva dvādasavassikassa mahāvattassa avicchedena pūritattā.
tika-s0403t:509_6: Aggabhaṇḍaṃ labhati devasikaṃ dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ aggato paṭṭhāya dānassa dinnattā.
tika-s0403t:509_8: āpajjanti deyyappaṭiggāhakavikappaṃ akatvā attani nirapekkhacittena cirakālaṃ dānassa pūritatāya pasāritacittattā.
tika-s0403t:510_7: Tathā hi dutiyavatthusmimpi therena attā pakāsito.
tika-s0403t:511_0: Giribhaṇḍamahāpūjāyāti cetiyagirimhi sakalalaṅkādīpe yojanappamāṇe samudde ca nāvāsaṅghāṭādike ṭhapetvā dīpapupphagandhādīhi kariyamānāya mahāpūjāya.
tika-s0403t:511_1: Tassā ca paṭipattiyā avañjhabhāvavibhāvanatthaṃ “ete mayhaṃ pāpuṇissantī”ti āha.
tika-s0403t:512_3: mama pattapariyāpannenapi sabbāpimā bhikkhuniyo yāpessantīti āha “mā tumhe tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ cintayitthā”ti.
tika-s0403t:512_6: therassa pana sīlatejeneva devatā ussukkaṃ āpajji.
tika-s0403t:513_1: Taṃ pana nesaṃ khaṇḍaṃ dassetuṃ “yassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:513_4: Na hi añño koci āpattikkhandhānaṃ anukkamo atthi,
tika-s0403t:513_6: Pariyante chinnasāṭako viyāti tatrante dasante vā chinnavatthaṃ viya.
tika-s0403t:513_20: tasmā taṇhādāsabyato mocanavacanena tesaṃ sīlānaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayatamāha.
tika-s0403t:513_21: Bhujissabhāvakaraṇatoti iminā bhujissakarāni bhujissānīti uttarapadalopenāyaṃ niddesoti dasseti.
tika-s0403t:513_22: Yasmā vā taṃsamaṅgipuggalo serī sayaṃvasī bhujisso nāma hoti,
tika-s0403t:513_25: Suparisuddhabhāvena vā sampannattā viññūhi pasatthānīti viññuppasatthāni.
tika-s0403t:514_0: Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattāti “imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā”ti taṇhāparāmāsena,
tika-s0403t:514_1: “imināhaṃ sīlena devo hutvā tattha nicco dhuvo sassato bhavissāmī”ti diṭṭhiparāmāsena ca aparāmaṭṭhattā.
tika-s0403t:514_2: Parāmaṭṭhunti “ayaṃ te sīlesu doso”ti catūsu vipattīsu yāya kāyaci vipattiyā dassanena parāmaṭṭhuṃ,
tika-s0403t:514_4: Sīlaṃ nāma avippaṭisārādipārampariyena yāvadeva samādhisampādanatthanti āha “samādhisaṃvattanikānī”ti.
tika-s0403t:515_1: paripuṇṇacatupārisuddhibhāvena majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇassa viya bhedābhāvato sīlena sāmaññaṃ sīlasāmaññaṃ,
tika-s0403t:515_5: Kāmaṃ puthujjanānampi catupārisuddhisīle nānattaṃ na siyā,
tika-s0403t:515_7: idaṃ ekantikaṃ niyatabhāvatoti āha “natthi maggasīle nānatta”nti.
tika-s0403t:515_8: Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttanti maggasīlaṃ sandhāya taṃ “yāni tāni sīlānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:516_0: Yāyanti yā ayaṃ mayhañceva tumhākañca paccakkhabhūtā.
tika-s0403t:516_5: Sayaṃ niyyantīyeva hi taṃsamaṅgipuggalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato niyyāpetīti vuccati.
tika-s0403t:519_4: Saṅgaṇhanatthāyāti saṅgahavatthuvisesabhāvato sabrahmacārīnaṃ saṅgahaṇāya saṃvattantīti sambandho.
tika-s0403t:519_6: Sati ca avivadanahetubhūtasaṅgahakatte tesaṃ vasena sabrahmacārīnaṃ samaggabhāvo bhedābhāvo siddhoyevāti āha “sāmaggiyā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t:522_2: Punappunaṃ katāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitā.
tika-s0403t:522_3: Yuttayānasadisā katāti yathā yuttamājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati,
tika-s0403t:522_5: Vatthukatāti vā adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthu viya katā,
tika-s0403t:522_6: sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena iddhivisesatāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t:522_11: Abhūtabyākaraṇaṃ byākarotīti “mettā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā”tiādinā attani avijjamānaguṇābhibyāhāraṃ byāharati.
tika-s0403t:522_13: Puna byāpādo natthīti idāni mama byāpādo nāma sabbaso natthīti ñatvā.
tika-s0403t:523_6: rāgo eva vā nimittaṃ rāganimittaṃ. Ādi-
tika-s0403t:523_10: Tayidaṃ nimittaṃ yasmā sabbena sabbaṃ arahattaphale natthi,
tika-s0403t:523_13: Nimittaṃ anussarati anugacchati ārabbha pavattati sīlenāti nimittānusārī.
tika-s0403t:524_1: Ayaṃ nāma ahamasmīti rūpalakkhaṇo vedanādīsu vā aññataralakkhaṇo ayaṃ nāma attā ahaṃ asmīti.
tika-s0403t:524_4: Puna asmimāno natthīti tassa anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ kittento samugghātattameva vibhāveti.
tika-s0403t:527_1: Catutthe āramitabbaṭṭhena vā kammaṃ ārāmo etassāti kammārāmo.
tika-s0403t:527_2: Kamme rato na ganthadhure vipassanādhure vāti kammarato.
tika-s0403t:527_3: Punappunaṃ yuttoti tapparabhāvena anu anu yutto pasuto.
tika-s0403t:530_1: Chaṭṭhe visabhāgavedanuppattiyā kakaceneva catuiriyāpathaṃ chindanto ābādhayatīti ābādho,
tika-s0403t:531_0: Sappaṭibhayakantārasadisā soḷasavatthukā aṭṭhavatthukā ca vicikicchā tiṇṇā imāyāti tiṇṇavicikicchā.
tika-s0403t:531_1: Vigatā samucchinnā pavattiādīsu “evaṃ nu kho na nu kho”ti evaṃ pavattikā kathaṃkathā assāti vigatakathaṃkathā.
tika-s0403t:531_2: Sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahīnattā rāgavikkhepesu sīlādiguṇesu ca tiṭṭhakattā vesārajjaṃ,
tika-s0403t:531_4: Attanā eva paccakkhato diṭṭhattā na paraṃ pacceti,
tika-s0403t:532_2: Gilāno hutvā vuṭṭhitoti idaṃ pana atthamattanidassanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:535_1: Sattame paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti ettha paṭisallānanti tehi tehi saddhivihārikaantevāsikaupāsakādisattehi
tika-s0403t:535_2: ceva rūpārammaṇādisaṅkhārehi ca paṭinivattitvā apasakkitvā nilīyanaṃ vivecanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:535_3: Kāyacittehi tato vivitto ekībhāvo pavivekoti āha “ekībhāvāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t:535_6: Vuṭṭhitoti tato duvidhavivekato bhavaṅguppattiyā sabrahmacārīhi samāgamena upeto.
tika-s0403t:541_1: Navame evaṃnāmake gāmeti nātikānāmakaṃ gāmaṃ nissāya.
tika-s0403t:541_8: So kira gāmo yesaṃ tadā tesaṃ pubbapurisena attano ñātīnaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvena nivasito,
tika-s0403t:541_10: Atha pacchā dvīhi dāyādehi dvidhā vibhajitvā paribhutto.
tika-s0403t:541_13: So hi āvāso yathā sudhāparikammena payojanaṃ natthi,
tika-s0403t:541_14: evaṃ iṭṭhakāhi eva cinitvā chādetvā kato.
tika-s0403t:541_15: Tasmiṃ kira padese mattikā sakkharamarumpavālukādīhi asammissā kathinā saṇhasukhumā,
tika-s0403t:541_16: tāya katāni kulālabhājanānipi silāmayāni viya daḷhāni.
tika-s0403t:541_17: Tasmā te upāsakā tāya mattikāya dīghaputhū iṭṭhakā kāretvā ṭhapetvā ṭhapetvā dvāravātapānakavāṭatulāyo
tika-s0403t:541_18: sabbaṃ dabbasambhārena vinā tāhi iṭṭhakāhiyeva pāsādaṃ kāresuṃ.
tika-s0403t:542_2: Bahu vata me kataṃ assāti bahu vata mayā attahitaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ kataṃ bhaveyya.
tika-s0403t:543_3: bahi nikkhantavāto vā anto pavisatīti ekasseva pavesanikkhamo viya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0403t:546_5: So mamassa antarāyoti yathāvuttā na kevalaṃ kālakiriyāva,
tika-s0403t:546_6: mama atidullabhaṃ khaṇaṃ labhitvā tassa satthusāsanamanasikārassa ceva jīvitassa ca saggamokkhānañca antarāyo assa,
tika-s0403t:546_10: Satthakena viya aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kantanakārakā kāye sandhibandhanacchedakavātā satthakavātā.
tika-s0403t:551_5: Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassapi obhāsassa kenaci kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā,
tika-s0403t:551_6: ayaṃ pana sabbasova pharatīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-
tika-s0403t:551_8: Attano obhāsena pharitvāti vatthālaṅkārasarīrasamuṭṭhitena obhāsena pharitvā,
tika-s0403t:551_9: candimā viya ekobhāsaṃ ekapajjotaṃ karitvāti attho.
tika-s0403t:551_20: Catunnaṃ vā khandhānaṃ apadakkhiṇaggāhitākārena pavattānaṃ etaṃ adhivacananti vadanti.
tika-s0403t:551_21: Pāpā assaddhādayo puggalā etassa mittāti pāpamitto,
tika-s0403t:551_24: Yāya hi cetanāya puggalo pāpamitto pāpasampavaṅko nāma hoti,
tika-s0403t:551_26: Cattāropi vā arūpino khandhā tadākārappavattā pāpamittatā.
tika-s0403t:554_2: upādānanti āha “jātiyā ca maraṇassa ca sambhave paccayabhūte”ti.
tika-s0403t:554_7: Sabbadukkhaṃ upaccagunti sakalampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkantā carimacittanirodhena vaṭṭadukkhalesassapi asambhavato.
tika-s0403t:557_4: tasmā ṭhapanakusaloti atthoti āha “samādhiṃ ṭhapetuṃ sakkotīti attho”ti.
tika-s0403t:557_5: Tattha ṭhapetuṃ sakkotīti sattaṭṭhaaccharāmattaṃ khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ sakkoti adhiṭṭhānavasibhāvassa nipphāditattā.
tika-s0403t:557_11: Kallaṃ kātunti samādhānassa paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrīkaraṇena sahakārīkāraṇānañca samappadhānena samāpajjane cittaṃ samatthaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-s0403t:557_12: Samādhissa gocarakusaloti samādhismiṃ nipphādetabbe tassa gocare kammaṭṭhānasaññite pavattiṭṭhāne bhikkhācāragocare satisampajaññayogato kusalo cheko.
tika-s0403t:557_14: Paṭhamajjhānādisamādhiṃ abhinīharitunti paṭhamajjhānādisamādhiṃ visesabhāgiyatāya abhinīharituṃ upanetuṃ.
tika-s0403t:560_1: Pañcame anussatikāraṇānīti anussatiyo eva diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādihitasukhānaṃ hetubhāvato kāraṇāni.
tika-s0403t:563_1: Chaṭṭhe sambādheti vā taṇhāsaṃkilesādīnaṃ sampīḷe saṅkare gharāvāse.
tika-s0403t:563_2: Okāsā vuccantīti maggaphalasukhādhigamāya okāsabhāvato okāsāti vuccanti.
tika-s0403t:563_4: Visujjhanatthāyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkiliṭṭhacittānaṃ visuddhatthāya.
tika-s0403t:563_5: Sā panāyaṃ cittassa visuddhi sijjhamānā yasmā sokādīnaṃ anupādāya saṃvattati,
tika-s0403t:563_7: Tattha socanaṃ ñātibyasanādinimittaṃ cetaso santāpo antotāpo antonijjhānaṃ soko,
tika-s0403t:563_12: Dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāyāti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya,
tika-s0403t:563_15: taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhati etenāti ñāyo,
tika-s0403t:563_17: Idha pana saha pubbabhāgena ariyamaggo gahitoti āha “sahavipassanakassa maggassa adhigamanatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0403t:566_1: Sattame vaḍḍhetīti manaso vivaṭṭanissitaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ āvahati.
tika-s0403t:566_3: Yañca āvajjato manasi karoto cittaṃ vinīvaraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t:566_4: Imasmiṃ pakkhe kammasādhano sambhāvanattho bhāvanīya- saddo.
tika-s0403t:566_7: saddena idha avuttānaṃ atibhojane nimittaggāhādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t:566_8: Vuttañhetaṃ “cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattanti atibhojane nimittaggāho,
tika-s0403t:569_1: Aṭṭhame maṇḍalasaṇṭhānamāḷasaṅkhepena katā bhojanasālā maṇḍalamāḷāti adhippetāti āha “bhojanasālāyā”ti.
tika-s0403t:572_1: Navame diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvoti āha “imasmiṃyeva attabhāve”ti.
tika-s0403t:572_3: Ālokasaññaṃ manasi karotīti sūriyacandapajjotamaṇiukkāvijjuādīnaṃ āloko divā rattiñca upaladdho,
tika-s0403t:572_7: yathāssa subhāvitālokakasiṇassa viya kasiṇāloko yathicchakaṃ yāvadicchakañca so āloko rattiyaṃ upatiṭṭhati.
tika-s0403t:572_11: Divāti saññaṃ ṭhapetīti vuttanayena manasi katvā divāriva saññaṃ uppādeti.
tika-s0403t:572_13: tatheva taṃ manasi karotīti yathānena divā upaladdho sūriyāloko,
tika-s0403t:572_14: evaṃ rattimpi divā diṭṭhākāreneva taṃ ālokaṃ manasi karoti.
tika-s0403t:572_16: manasi karotīti yathā rattiyaṃ candāloko upaladdho,
tika-s0403t:572_17: evaṃ divāpi rattiṃ diṭṭhākāreneva taṃ ālokaṃ manasi karoti,
tika-s0403t:572_22: Dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ rūpagatassa dibbassa itarassa ca dassanaṭṭhena idha ñāṇadassananti adhippetanti āha “dibbacakkhusaṅkhātassā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t:573_0: Uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānāti jīvitakkhayato upari maraṇato paraṃ.
tika-s0403t:573_8: Kucchitaṃ vinīlaṃ vinīlakanti kucchanattho vā ayaṃ ka-
tika-s0403t:573_9: kāroti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ yathā “pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti.
tika-s0403t:574_0: So bhikkhūti yo “passeyya sarīraṃ sīvathikāya chaḍḍita”nti vutto,
tika-s0403t:574_7: Evaṃpūtikasabhāvoti evaṃ ativiya pūtisabhāvo āyuādivigame viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0403t:574_8: Ediso bhavissatīti evaṃbhāvīti āha “evamevaṃ uddhumātādibhedo bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0403t:575_1: Sesāvasesamaṃsalohitayuttanti sabbaso akkhāditattā tahaṃ tahaṃ sesena appāvasesena maṃsalohitena yuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:575_2: Aññena hatthaṭṭhikanti avisesena hatthaṭṭhikānaṃ vippakiṇṇatā jotitāti anavasesato tesaṃ vippakiṇṇataṃ dassento “catusaṭṭhibhedampī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t:575_4: Tāni pana saṃvaccharaṃ vītivattāni hontīti āha “atikkantasaṃvaccharānī”ti.
tika-s0403t:575_10: Satiyā ca ñāṇassa ca atthāyāti “abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotī”tiādinā vuttāya sattaṭṭhānikāya satiyā ceva taṃsampayuttañāṇassa ca atthāya.
tika-s0403t:578_6: puthujjanehi sevitabbattā tesaṃ santakanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t:578_12: Tādisañca atthasannissitaṃ na hotīti āha “na atthasannissita”nti.
tika-s0403t:578_14: Asati pana vaṭṭe nibbidāya virāgādīnaṃ asambhavoyevāti āha “na virāgāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t:579_2: Hatthivisayattā hatthisannissitattā ca hatthisippaṃ “hatthī”ti gahetvā “hatthismimpi sikkhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:579_3: Tasmā hatthisippe sikkhatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t:580_0: Liṅgabyattayena vibhattibyattayena pāricariyeti vuttanti āha “pāricariyāya paccupaṭṭhitā”ti.
tika-s0403t:585_1: Catutthassa paṭhame sekhānaṃ paṭiladdhaguṇassa parihāni nāma natthīti āha “uparūpariguṇaparihānāyā”ti,
tika-s0403t:588_3: Atha vā vijjābhāge vijjākoṭṭhāse vattanti vijjāsabhāgatāya tadekadese vijjākoṭṭhāse pavattantīti vijjābhāgiyā.
tika-s0403t:588_8: Pacchimena atthena tāsu yā kāci ekāva vijjā vijjā,
tika-s0403t:588_11: Idha pana vipassanāñāṇasampayuttā saññāva vijjābhāgiyāti āgatā,
tika-s0403t:591_2: Yasmā so appahīnakodhatāya adhigatakodho nāma hoti,
tika-s0403t:591_6: Vivādo nāma uppajjamāno yebhuyyena paṭhamaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena uppajjatīti vuttaṃ “dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo”ti.
tika-s0403t:591_7: So pana yathā bahūnaṃ anatthāvaho hoti,
tika-s0403t:592_0: Guṇamakkhanāya pavattopi attano kārakaṃ gūthena paharantiṃ gūtho viya paṭhamataraṃ makkhetīti makkho,
tika-s0403t:592_3: parassa guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya apanetīti attho.
tika-s0403t:592_5: Paḷāsī puggalo hi dutiyassa dhuraṃ na deti,
tika-s0403t:592_11: Saṭhayati na sammā bhāsatīti saṭho aññathā santaṃ attānaṃ aññathā pavedanato.
tika-s0403t:592_13: Micchā pāpikā viññugarahitā etassa diṭṭhīti micchādiṭṭhi,
tika-s0403t:592_14: kammapathapariyāpannāya “natthi dinna”ntiādivatthukāya micchattapariyāpannāya aniyyānikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgatoti attho.
tika-s0403t:593_6: Yuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ disvāva laddhiṃ paṭinissajjatīti paṭinissaggī,
tika-s0403t:593_7: dukkhena kicchena kasirena bahumpi kāraṇaṃ dassetvā na sakkā paṭinissaggaṃ kātunti duppaṭinissaggī.
tika-s0403t:593_8: Yo attano uppannadiṭṭhiṃ “idameva sacca”nti daḷhaṃ gaṇhitvā api buddhādīhi kāraṇaṃ dassetvā vuccamāno na paṭinissajjati.
tika-s0403t:593_10: Tādiso hi puggalo yaṃ yadeva dhammaṃ vā adhammaṃ vā suṇāti,
tika-s0403t:593_12: evaṃ amhehi suta”nti kummova aṅgāni sake kapāle antoyeva samodahati.
tika-s0403t:593_13: Yathā hi kacchapo attano hatthapādādike aṅge kenaci ghaṭite sabbāni aṅgāni attano kapāleyeva samodahati,
tika-s0403t:593_16: chaḍḍehi na”nti vutto taṃ na vissajjati,
tika-s0403t:593_17: antoyeva attano hadaye eva ṭhapetvā vicarati,
tika-s0403t:597_0: “Pubbeva dānā sumano”tiādigāthāya pubbeva dānā muñcacetanāya pubbe dānūpakaraṇasambharaṇato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0403t:597_1: sumano “sampattīnaṃ nidānaṃ anugāmikadānaṃ dassāmī”ti somanassito bhaveyya.
tika-s0403t:597_2: Dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādayeti dadanto deyyadhammaṃ dakkhiṇeyyahatthe patiṭṭhāpento “asārato dhanato sārādānaṃ karomī”ti attano cittaṃ pasādeyya.
tika-s0403t:597_3: Datvā attamano hotīti dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ deyyadhammaṃ pariccajitvā “paṇḍitapaññattaṃ nāma mayā anuṭṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0403t:597_4: aho sādhu suṭṭhū”ti attamano pamudito pītisomanassajāto hoti.
tika-s0403t:597_5: Esāti yā ayaṃ pubbacetanā muñcacetanā aparacetanāti imāsaṃ kammaphalānaṃ saddhānugatānaṃ somanassapariggahitānaṃ tividhānaṃ cetanānaṃ pāripūrī, esā.
tika-s0403t:601_1: Aṭṭhame kusalakiriyāya ādiārambhabhāvena pavattavīriyaṃ ṭhitasabhāvatāya sabhāvadhāraṇaṭṭhena dhātūti vuttanti āha –
tika-s0403t:601_3: Laddhāsevanaṃ vīriyaṃ balappattaṃ hutvā paṭipakkhe vidhamatīti āha “nikkamadhātūti kosajjato nikkhamanasabhāvaṃ vīriya”nti.
tika-s0403t:601_4: Parakkamanasabhāvoti adhimattatarānaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vidhamanasamatthatāya paṭupaṭutarabhāvena paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanasabhāvo.
tika-s0403t:604_1: Dvādasame māhaṃ nāgita yasena samāgamanti mā ahaṃ yasena samāgamanaṃ patthemi.
tika-s0403t:604_2: Mā ca mayā yasoti yaso ca mayā mā samāgacchatūti attho.
tika-s0403t:609_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame parisiñcitunti yo cuṇṇamattikādīhi gattāni ubbaṭṭento mallakamuṭṭhādīhi vā ghaṃsanto nahāyati,
tika-s0403t:609_5: Bhagavato ca sarīre tathā haritabbaṃ rajojallaṃ nāma nupalimpati acchachavibhāvato,
tika-s0403t:609_6: utuggahaṇatthaṃ pana bhagavā kevalaṃ udake otarati.
tika-s0403t:610_3: Tathā hi so vipassissa bhagavato kāle yojaniko ahosi,
tika-s0403t:610_10: Tampi nagaraṃ tassa vihārassa kadāci pācīnato hoti,
tika-s0403t:610_14: Jetavanagandhakuṭiyaṃ pana catunnaṃ mañcapādānaṃ patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ acalameva.
tika-s0403t:610_19: Ayaṃ pana pubbakoṭṭhako kassapadasabalassa vīsatiusabhavihārakāle pācīnadvārakoṭṭhako ahosi.
tika-s0403t:611_0: Kassapadasabalassa kāle aciravatī nagaraṃ parikkhipitvā sandamānā pubbakoṭṭhakaṃ patvā udakena bhinditvā
tika-s0403t:611_5: ekaṃ buddhānanti evaṃ pāṭiekkāni nhānatitthāni honti ramaṇīyānivippakiṇṇarajatapaṭṭasadisavālukāni.
tika-s0403t:611_6: Iti bhagavatā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṃ yena ayaṃ evarūpo pubbakoṭṭhako,
tika-s0403t:611_10: Thero dupaṭṭena saddhiṃ mahācīvaraṃ attano hatthagataṃ akāsi.
tika-s0403t:611_12: sahotaraṇenevassa udake macchakacchapā sabbe suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ahesuṃ,
tika-s0403t:611_13: yantanāḷikāhi suvaṇṇarasadhārāni siñcanakālo viya suvaṇṇapaṭappasāraṇakālo viya ca ahosi.
tika-s0403t:611_14: Atha bhagavato nahānavattaṃ dassetvā paccuttiṇṇassa thero surattadupaṭṭaṃ upanāmesi.
tika-s0403t:611_15: Bhagavā taṃ nivāsetvā vijjullatāsadisaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā mahācīvaraṃ antantena saṃharitvā padumagabbhasadisaṃ
tika-s0403t:611_16: katvā upanītaṃ dvīsu kaṇṇesu gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0403t:611_17: Tena vuttaṃ “pubbakoṭṭhake gattāni parisiñcitvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsī”ti.
tika-s0403t:612_0: Evaṃ ṭhitassa pana bhagavato sarīraṃ vikasitapadumapupphasadisaṃ sabbapāliphullaṃ pāricchattakaṃ,
tika-s0403t:612_1: tārāmarīcivikasitañca gaganatalaṃ siriyā avahasamānaṃ viya virocittha,
tika-s0403t:612_2: byāmappabhāparikkhepavilāsinī cassa dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇamālā ganthitvā ṭhapitā dvattiṃsa candimā viya,
tika-s0403t:612_8: tasmā tahaṃ tahaṃ viniggatasujātajātihiṅgulakarasūpasobhitaṃ upari satamegharatanāvalisucchāditaṃ jaṅgamamiva kanakagirisikharaṃ virocittha.
tika-s0403t:612_9: Tasmiñca samaye dasabalassa sarīrato nikkhamitvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo samantato asītihatthappamāṇe padese
tika-s0403t:612_15: Evarūpesu ṭhānesu buddhānaṃ sarīravaṇṇaṃ vā guṇavaṇṇaṃ vā cuṇṇiyapadehi vā gāthāhi vā atthañca upamāyo
tika-s0403t:612_16: ca kāraṇāni ca āharitvā paṭibalena dhammakathikena pūretvā kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0403t:612_17: Evarūpesu hi ṭhānesu dhammakathikassa thāmo veditabbo.
tika-s0403t:612_20: Sodake gatte cīvaraṃ pārupantassa hi cīvare kaṇṇikāni uṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0403t:612_22: buddhānaṃ pana sarīre rajojallaṃ na upalimpati,
tika-s0403t:612_23: padumapatte ukkhittaudakabindu viya udakaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā gacchati.
tika-s0403t:612_24: Evaṃ santepi sikkhāgāravatāya bhagavā “pabbajitavattaṃ nāmeta”nti mahācīvaraṃ ubhosu kaṇṇesu gahetvā purato kāyaṃ paṭicchādetvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0403t:613_4: Atha vā bherimudiṅgapaṇavāditūriyānaṃ tāḷitaṃ vīṇāveḷugomukhiādīnaṃ vāditañca tūriyatāḷitavāditanti vā evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t:614_2: So hi bhagavā sabbadhamme abhijānanto gatoti abhiññāpāragū.
tika-s0403t:614_8: Subrahmadevaputtādayoti ettha so kira devaputto accharāsaṅghaparivuto nandanakīḷitaṃ katvā pāricchattakamūle paññattāsane nisīdi.
tika-s0403t:614_10: pañcasatā rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā madhurassarena gāyitvā pupphāni pātenti.
tika-s0403t:614_12: Atha rukkhaṃ abhiruḷhā upacchedakavasena ekappahāreneva kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbattā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavanti.
tika-s0403t:614_13: Atha kāle gacchante devaputto “imāsaṃ neva saddo suyyati,
tika-s0403t:614_15: kahaṃ nu kho gatā”ti āvajjento niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ disvā piyavatthukasokena ruppamāno cintesi –
tika-s0403t:614_18: So “sattame divase mayāpi avasesāhi pañcasatāhi saddhiṃ kālaṃ katvā tattheva nibbattitabba”nti disvā balavatarena sokena samappito.
tika-s0403t:614_19: “Imaṃ mayhaṃ sokaṃ sadevake loke aññatra tathāgatā nibbāpetuṃ samattho natthī”ti cintetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito –
tika-s0403t:617_0: Sace atthi anutrastaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti. –
tika-s0403t:621_1: So desanāpariyosāne vigatasoko pañcahi accharāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0403t:623_5: sabbāpi sīlasaṃvaro soracca”nti vacanato sucisīlaṃ “soracca”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:624_3: Na lippatīti na allīyati anusayato ārammaṇakaraṇato vā taṇhādiṭṭhiabhinivesābhāvato.
tika-s0403t:627_4: Bhavissantīti atītatthe anāgatavacanaṃ katanti āha “bhavissantīti jātā”ti.
tika-s0403t:627_5: Purāṇassa hi isidattassa ca samagatikaṃ sandhāya sā evamāha.
tika-s0403t:628_2: Itthīsu yadidaṃ ammakā mātugāmo jananī janikāti.
tika-s0403t:629_0: Diṭṭhiyā paṭivijjhitabbaṃ appaṭividdhaṃ hotīti atthato kāraṇato ca paññāya paṭivijjhitabbaṃ appaṭividdhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t:629_1: nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā yāthāvato aviditaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t:629_2: Samaye samaye kilesehi vimuccanakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ idha sāmāyikaṃ ma-
tika-s0403t:629_4: “sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ na labhatīti kālānukālaṃ dhammassavanaṃ nissāya pītipāmojjaṃ na labhatī”ti.
tika-s0403t:630_0: Tadantaranti vacanavipallāsena upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ katanti āha “taṃ antaraṃ taṃ kāraṇa”nti.
tika-s0403t:633_8: suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti kenaci akampiyabhāvena okappanaṃ ratanattayaguṇe ogāhetvā kappanaṃ okappanasaddhā nāma.
tika-s0403t:633_10: idaṃ pana kammaṃ saka”nti evaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca kammassakatajānanapaññā kammassakatapaññā.
tika-s0403t:633_11: Tividhañhi duccaritaṃ attanā katampi sakakammaṃ nāma na hoti atthabhañjanato.
tika-s0403t:633_13: Iṇādānasminti paccattavacanatthe etaṃ bhummanti āha “iṇaggahaṇaṃ vadāmī”ti.
tika-s0403t:634_0: Kaṭaggāhoti kataṃ sabbaso siddhameva katvā gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t:634_10: Yo gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodetvā catūsu iriyāpathesu aṭṭhaārambhavatthuvasena ekako hoti,
tika-s0403t:634_11: tassa kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t:634_13: Gamane uppannakilesassa ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
tika-s0403t:634_15: nisajjāya uppannakilesassa sayanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
tika-s0403t:634_17: Ayaṃ cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t:634_18: Paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena seṭṭhaṭṭhena ca eko udetīti ekodi, ekaggatā.
tika-s0403t:634_22: Aññataraṃ kāyādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sātisayāya satiyā saratīti sato.
tika-s0403t:635_0: Akuppā me vimuttīti mayhaṃ arahattaphalavimutti akuppatāya akuppārammaṇatāya ca akuppā.
tika-s0403t:635_1: Sā hi rāgādīhi na kuppatīti akuppatāyapi akuppā.
tika-s0403t:635_6: Imāni hi satte bhavesu saṃyojenti upanibandhanti bhavābhavena saṃyojenti,
tika-s0403t:635_9: Aññe hi sattā yāva na kilesā pahīyanti,
tika-s0403t:638_3: Taṃ pana yasmā catūhi maggehi paccekaṃ catūsu saccesu kattabbattā soḷasavidhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:638_5: Khandhakilesaabhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātā tayo osīdāpanaṭṭhena bhārā viyāti bhārā.
tika-s0403t:638_6: Te ohitā oropitā nikkhittā pātitā etenāti ohitabhāro.
tika-s0403t:638_13: Ettha hi arahattaṃ attano yonisomanasikārāyattattā attūpanibandhaṭṭhena sasantānapariyāpannattā attānaṃ
tika-s0403t:638_14: avijahanaṭṭhena attano uttamatthena ca attano atthattā “sakattho”ti vuccati.
tika-s0403t:638_17: acchinnabhūtāya maggapaññāya sammā yathābhūtaṃ dukkhādīsu yo yathā jānitabbo,
tika-s0403t:638_20: Vimuttoti ca dve vimuttiyo sabbassa cittasaṃkilesassa maggo nibbānādhimutti ca.
tika-s0403t:641_1: Aṭṭhame upanisīdati phalaṃ etthāti kāraṇaṃ upanisā.
tika-s0403t:641_8: maggāmagge vavatthapetvā ṭhitañāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:641_10: Balavavipassanāti bhayatupaṭṭhāne ñāṇaṃ ādīnavānupassane ñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:641_13: tāva taruṇavipassanā”ti hi vacanato upakkilesavimuttaudayabbayañāṇato balavavipassanā.
tika-s0403t:644_1: Navame therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamātiādipāḷipadesu imināva nayena attho daṭṭhabbo –
tika-s0403t:644_4: Vācuggatadhāraṇena sammadeva garūnaṃ santike āgamitabhāvena āgato pariyattidhammasaṅkhāto āgamo etesanti āgatāgamā.
tika-s0403t:644_9: Taṃ atthaparipucchāya paripañhati vīmaṃsati vicāreti. Idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ,
tika-s0403t:644_11: Āvivaṭañceva pāḷiyā atthaṃ padesantarapāḷidassanena āgamato vivaranti.
tika-s0403t:644_13: Kaṅkhāṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu saṃsayuppattiyā hetuyā gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtesu pāḷipadesu yāthāvato vinicchayadānena kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti.
tika-s0403t:647_3: Pathaviyā dāyatthāya vā cittaṃ abhiniveso etesanti pathavībhinivesā.
tika-s0403t:650_1: Ekādasame jaṅgalānanti ettha yo nipicchalo na anūpo nirudakatāya thaddhalūkho bhūmippadeso,
tika-s0403t:650_3: Tabbahulatāya pana idha sabbo bhūmippadeso jaṅgalo.
tika-s0403t:650_4: Tasmiṃ jaṅgale jātā bhavāti vā jaṅgalā,
tika-s0403t:650_6: Evañhi nadicarānampi hatthīnaṃ saṅgaho kato hoti samodhātabbānaṃ viya samodhāyakānampi idha jaṅgalaggahaṇena gahetabbato.
tika-s0403t:650_7: Pathavītalacārīnanti iminā jalacārino ca nivatteti adissamānapādattā.
tika-s0403t:650_17: Kūṭasamosaraṇāti chidde anupavisanavasena ca āhacca avatthānena ca kūṭe samodahitvā ṭhitā.
tika-s0403t:650_18: Vaṇṭe patamāne sabbāni bhūmiyaṃ patantīti āha “vaṇṭānuvattakāni bhavantī”ti.
tika-s0403t:653_9: Yassa pana jātadivase dasasahassī lokadhātu ekaddhajamālāvippakiṇṇakusumavāsacuṇṇagaṇasugandhā sabbapāliphullamiva
tika-s0403t:653_10: nandanavanaṃ virocamānā paduminipaṇṇe udakabindu viya akampittha,
tika-s0403t:653_15: Santanetvā sabbaso tanetvā pattharitvā ṭhitamūlāni mūlasantānakāni.
tika-s0403t:653_16: Tāni pana atthato mūlāniyevāti āha “mūlasantānakānanti mūlāna”nti.
tika-s0403t:654_1: rañño aparimitassa ca sattakāyassa anatthato paripālanasamatthatāya ca “jotipālo”ti laddhanāmattā vuttaṃ “nāmena jotipālo”ti.
tika-s0403t:654_4: Taṃ kira tassa brāhmaṇassa kulaparamparāgataṃ ṭhānantaraṃ.
tika-s0403t:654_8: Goti hi paññāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ “gacchati atthe bujjhatī”ti katvā.
tika-s0403t:654_10: So kira disampatissa nāma rañño purohitassa govindabrāhmaṇassa putto hutvā attano pitussa ca rañño ca accayena tassa putto reṇu,
tika-s0403t:654_13: dve dhataraṭṭhāti ime satta rājāno yathā aññamaññaṃ na vivadanti.
tika-s0403t:654_14: Evaṃ rajje patiṭṭhāpetvā tesaṃ atthadhamme anusāsante jambudīpatale sabbesaṃ rājāva raññaṃ,
tika-s0403t:654_16: devova gahapatikānaṃ sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito uttamagāravaṭṭhānaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0403t:656_0: Reṇu dve ca dhataraṭṭhā, tadāsuṃ satta bhāradhā”ti. ;
tika-s0403t:657_0: Rañño diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthānaṃ puro vidhānato pure saṃvidhānato purohito.
tika-s0403t:657_2: Karuṇā assa atthīti karuṇanti sapubbabhāgakaruṇajjhānaṃ vuttanti āha “karuṇāya ca karuṇāpubbabhāge ca ṭhitā”ti.
tika-s0403t:657_6: Sakadāgāmissa hi pañcindriyāni sakadāgāmibhāvaṃ paṭicca mudūni nāma honti.
tika-s0403t:664_1: Chaṭṭhassa paṭhame nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsaneti ettha kiṃ taṃ āsanaṃ paṭhamameva paññattaṃ,
tika-s0403t:664_4: yadidaṃ attano vasanaṭṭhāne buddhāsanaṃ paññapetvāva nisīdananti dassento āha “padhānikabhikkhū”tiādi.
tika-s0403t:664_5: Buddhakāle kira yattha yattha ekopi bhikkhu viharati,
tika-s0403t:664_7: Bhagavā hi attano santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā phāsukaṭṭhāne viharante manasi karoti –
tika-s0403t:664_9: asakkhi nu kho visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ, no”ti.
tika-s0403t:664_10: Atha naṃ passati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā akusalavitakkaṃ vitakkayamānaṃ,
tika-s0403t:664_11: tato “kathañhi nāma mādisassa satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharantaṃ imaṃ kulaputtaṃ akusalavitakkā
tika-s0403t:664_12: adhibhavitvā anamatagge vaṭṭadukkhe saṃsāressantī”ti tassa anuggahatthaṃ tattheva attānaṃ dassetvā taṃ
tika-s0403t:664_13: kulaputtaṃ ovaditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā puna attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
tika-s0403t:664_14: Athevaṃ ovadiyamānā te bhikkhū cintayiṃsu “satthā amhākaṃ manaṃ jānitvā āgantvā amhākaṃ samīpe ṭhitaṃyeva attānaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0403t:664_16: idha nisīdatha nisīdathā’ti āsanapariyesanaṃ nāma bhāro”ti.
tika-s0403t:664_21: so mañcaṃ vā phalakaṃ vā pāsāṇaṃ vā vālikāpuñjaṃ vā paññapeti.
tika-s0403t:664_22: Taṃ alabhamānā purāṇapaṇṇānipi saṃkaḍḍhitvā tattha paṃsukūlaṃ pattharitvā ṭhapenti.
tika-s0403t:665_0: Satta sarāti – chajjo, usabho, gandhāro, majjhimo, pañcamo, dhevato,
tika-s0403t:665_7: Manussaloke vīṇāvādanā ekekassa sarassa vasena tayo tayo mucchanāti katvā ekavīsati mucchanā.
tika-s0403t:665_8: Devaloke vīṇāvādanā pana samapaññāsa mucchanāti vadanti.
tika-s0403t:665_9: Tattha hi ekekassa sarassa vasena satta satta mucchanā,
tika-s0403t:665_10: antarassa sarassa ca ekāti samapaññāsa mucchanā.
tika-s0403t:665_11: Teneva sakkapañhasuttasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “samapaññāsa mucchanā mucchetvā”ti pañcasikhassa vīṇāvādanaṃ dassentena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:665_12: Ṭhānā ekūnapaññāsāti ekekasseva sarassa satta satta ṭhānabhedā,
tika-s0403t:665_14: Ekūnapaññāsaṭṭhānaviseso tisso duve catasso catasso tisso duve catassoti dvāvīsati sutibhedā ca icchitā.
tika-s0403t:666_0: Atigāḷhaṃ āraddhanti thinamiddhachambhitattānaṃ vūpasamatthaṃ ativiya āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0403t:666_5: Khayā rāgassa vītarāgattāti ettha yasmā bāhirako kāmesu vītarāgo na khayā rāgassa vītarāgo sabbaso avippahīnarāgattā.
tika-s0403t:667_0: Lābhasakkārasilokaṃ nikāmayamānoti ettha labbhati pāpuṇīyatīti lābho,
tika-s0403t:667_3: Paccayā eva hi paṇītapaṇītā sundarasundarā abhisaṅkharitvā katā “sakkāro”ti vuccati,
tika-s0403t:668_0: Thūṇanti pasūnaṃ bandhanatthāya nikhātatthambhasaṅkhātaṃ thūṇaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0403t:671_3: Vattaṃ kiretaṃ bāḷhagilānenapi vuḍḍhataraṃ disvā uṭṭhitākārena apaciti dassetabbā.
tika-s0403t:671_4: Tena pana “mā cali mā calī”ti vattabbo,
tika-s0403t:671_5: taṃ pana calanaṃ uṭṭhānākāradassanaṃ hotīti āha “uṭṭhānākāraṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-s0403t:671_6: Santimāni āsanānīti paṭhamameva paññatthāsanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0403t:671_9: āsanaṃ paññattameva hotū”ti antamaso phalakamattampi paṇṇasanthāramattampi paññattameva.
tika-s0403t:671_12: Sīsavedanāti kutoci nikkhamituṃ alabhamānehi vātehi samuṭṭhāpitā balavatiyo sīsavedanā honti.
tika-s0403t:675_2: Rodenti kururakammantatāya sappaṭibaddhe satte assūni mocentīti ruddā,
tika-s0403t:675_6: Iminā aññepi ye keci māgavikā nesādā vuttā,
tika-s0403t:676_1: Te kira sacchandarāgena paribhuñjantīti adhippāyena catūsu paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādantīti “kaṇṭakavuttikā”ti vadati.
tika-s0403t:676_3: Yasmā te paṇīte paccaye paṭisevantīti tassa micchāgāho.
tika-s0403t:676_4: Ñāyaladdhepi paccaye bhuñjamānā ājīvakasamayassa vilomaggāhitāya paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti nāmāti vadatīti.
tika-s0403t:676_5: Atha vā kaṇṭakavuttikā evaṃnāmakā eke pabbajitā,
tika-s0403t:676_7: Tathā hi te kaṇṭake vattantā viya hontīti “kaṇṭakavuttikā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0403t:676_8: Imameva ca atthavikappaṃ sandhāyāha “kaṇṭakavuttikāti samaṇā nāmete”ti.
tika-s0403t:677_1: Te kira ṭhatvā bhuñjananahānappaṭikkhepādivatasamāyogena purimehi dvīhi paṇḍaratarā.
tika-s0403t:678_1: Te kira ājīvakaladdhiyā suvisuddhacittatāya nigaṇṭhehipi paṇḍaratarā.
tika-s0403t:678_2: Evañca katvā attano paccayadāyake nigaṇṭhehipi jeṭṭhakatare karoti.
tika-s0403t:679_2: Nandādayo hi tathārūpaṃ ājīvakappaṭipattiṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pāpetvā ṭhitā,
tika-s0403t:679_3: tasmā nigaṇṭhehi ājīvakasāvakehi ca paṇḍaratarāti “paramasukkābhijātī”ti vuttā.
tika-s0403t:680_0: Bilaṃ olaggeyyunti maṃsabhāgaṃ nhārunā vā kenaci vā ganthitvā purisassa hatthe vā kese vā olambanavasena bandheyyuṃ.
tika-s0403t:680_2: Satthavāho kira mahākantāraṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge goṇe mate maṃsaṃ gahetvā sabbesaṃ satthikānaṃ “idaṃ
tika-s0403t:680_3: khāditvā ettakaṃ mūlaṃ dātabba”nti koṭṭhāsaṃ olambati.
tika-s0403t:680_8: taṃ mūlaṃ satthikehi dhāraṇatthaṃ sabbesaṃ balakkārena koṭṭhāsaṃ datvā mūlaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0403t:681_0: Kaṇhābhijātiyo samānoti kaṇhe nīcakule jāto hutvā.
tika-s0403t:681_1: Kaṇhadhammanti paccatte upayogavacananti āha “kaṇhasabhāvo hutvā abhijāyatī”ti,
tika-s0403t:681_4: Tasmā kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyatīti kāḷakaṃ dasadussīlyadhammaṃ uppādeti.
tika-s0403t:681_5: Sukkaṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyatīti etthāpi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t:681_6: So hi “ahaṃ pubbepi puññānaṃ akatattā nīcakule nibbatto,
tika-s0403t:681_7: idāni puññaṃ karissāmī”ti puññasaṅkhātaṃ paṇḍaradhammaṃ karoti.
tika-s0403t:682_0: Akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ nibbānanti sace kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-s0403t:682_5: Nibbānañca nāma imasmiṃ atthe arahattaṃ adhippetaṃ “abhijāyatī”ti vacanato.
tika-s0403t:682_6: Tañhi kilesanibbānante jātattā nibbānaṃ nāma yathā “rāgādīnaṃ khayante jātattā rāgakkhayo,
tika-s0403t:682_12: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “jāyatī”ti imassa pāpuṇātīhi atthaṃ gahetvāva “nibbānaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:682_13: Sukkābhijātiyo samānoti sukke uccakule jāto hutvā.
tika-s0403t:685_4: aññassa tathābhāvappaṭisedhano vāti vuttaṃ “idhāti idhasmiṃ sāsane”ti.
tika-s0403t:685_6: saddo ñāṇakoṭṭhāsapaññattigaṇanādīsu dissati “saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevatī”tiādīsu hi ñāṇe dissati.
tika-s0403t:685_16: Nimittaggāhoti itthipurisanimittassa subhanimittādikassa vā kilesavatthubhūtassa nimittassa gāho.
tika-s0403t:686_5: evaṃ tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya taṃ ṭhāno saṃvaro cakkhundriyasaṃvaro.
tika-s0403t:686_7: Nanu ca cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi.
tika-s0403t:686_8: Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya sati vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā uppajjati.
tika-s0403t:686_9: Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
tika-s0403t:686_10: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
tika-s0403t:686_14: tato kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
tika-s0403t:686_17: na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye ca saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā atthi.
tika-s0403t:686_18: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati,
tika-s0403t:686_20: Tasmiṃ pana sīlādīsu uppannesu saṃvaro hoti,
tika-s0403t:686_21: tasmā “cakkhundriye saṃvaro”ti kasmā vuttanti āha “javane uppajjamānopi hesa…pe…
tika-s0403t:687_1: yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo susaṃvutā,
tika-s0403t:687_2: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti.
tika-s0403t:687_3: Nagaradvārena hi pavisitvā corā yadicchakaṃ kareyyuṃ,
tika-s0403t:687_4: evamevaṃ javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi.
tika-s0403t:687_5: Yathā pana nagaradvāresu saṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharādayo asaṃvutā,
tika-s0403t:687_6: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti.
tika-s0403t:687_7: Nagaradvāresu hi pihitesu corānaṃ paveso natthi,
tika-s0403t:687_8: evamevaṃ javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi suguttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi,
tika-s0403t:688_1: Ayamevettha attho sundarataroti upari pāḷiyaṃ sandissanato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:689_0: Yanti ādesoti iminā liṅgavipallāsena saddhiṃ vacanavipallāso katoti dasseti,
tika-s0403t:689_5: Yathā panettha āsavā aññe ca vighātakarā kilesapariḷāhā sambhavanti,
tika-s0403t:689_13: yañca saṃvaraphalanti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0403t:689_20: Cakkhundriyañhi saṃvaraṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ rūpārammaṇe saṃvarayatīti avuttasiddhoyamattho.
tika-s0403t:689_23: Sabbatthevāti manodvāre pañcadvāre cāti sabbasmiṃ dvāre.
tika-s0403t:690_0: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvarantiādīsu “sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā paccavekkhaṇameva yoniso paṭisaṅkhā.
tika-s0403t:690_2: Bhavapatthanāya assādayatoti bhavapatthanāmukhena bhāvitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assādentassa.
tika-s0403t:690_7: Sītassāti sītadhātukkhobhato vā utupariṇāmato vā uppannassa sītassa.
tika-s0403t:690_15: Yasmiñhi aṅge vivaṭe hirī kuppati vinassati,
tika-s0403t:691_1: So hi piṇḍolyena bhikkhuno patte patanato,
tika-s0403t:691_2: tattha tattha laddhabhikkhāpiṇḍānaṃ pāto sannipātoti vā “piṇḍapāto”ti vuccati.
tika-s0403t:691_18: Purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmīti purāṇaṃ abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanaṃ paṭihanissāmi.
tika-s0403t:691_19: Navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti navaṃ bhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanaṃ na uppādessāmi.
tika-s0403t:691_21: Ettha abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanā nāma yathāvuttajighacchānimittā vedanā.
tika-s0403t:691_22: Sā hi abhuñjantassa bhiyyo bhiyyopavaḍḍhanavasena uppajjati,
tika-s0403t:691_24: Sā hi bhuttapaccayā anuppannāva na uppajjissati.
tika-s0403t:692_0: Yātrā ca me bhavissatīti yāpanā ca me catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ bhavissati.
tika-s0403t:692_2: idha catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ avicchedasaṅkhātā yāpanāti ayametāsaṃ viseso.
tika-s0403t:692_7: Yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakabhojanaparivajjanena vā seyyasukhapassasukhamiddhasukhādīnaṃ abhāvato anavajjatā.
tika-s0403t:696_1: Yattha vihārādike seti nipajjati āsati nisīdati,
tika-s0403t:696_7: Atha vā yathāvutto utu ca sīhabyagghādipākaṭaparissayo ca rāgadosādipaṭicchannaparissayo ca utuparissayo,
tika-s0403t:696_9: Cīvarappaṭisevane hirīkopīnappaṭicchādanaṃ viya taṃ niyatapayojananti puna “yāvadevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:697_2: jīvitassa parivārasambhārabhāvehi parikkhāro cāti gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro, taṃ.
tika-s0403t:697_3: Veyyābādhikānanti veyyābādhato dhātukkhobhato ca taṃnibbattakuṭṭhagaṇḍapīḷakādirogato uppannānaṃ.
tika-s0403t:697_6: Yāva taṃ dukkhaṃ sabbaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t:697_9: Navavedanuppādatopīti na kevalaṃ āyatiṃ eva vipākapariḷāhā,
tika-s0403t:697_10: atha kho atibhojanapaccayā alaṃsāṭakādīnaṃ viya navavedanuppādatopi veditabbā.
tika-s0403t:698_0: Kammaṭṭhānikassa calanaṃ nāma kammaṭṭhānapariccāgoti āha “calati kampati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vijahatī”ti.
tika-s0403t:698_1: “Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā”ti ettha ca lomasanāgattherassa vatthu kathetabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:698_2: Thero kira cetiyapabbate piyaṅguguhāya padhānaghare viharanto antaraṭṭhake himapātasamaye lokantarikanirayaṃ
tika-s0403t:698_4: Gimhasamaye ca pacchābhattaṃ bahicaṅkame kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaroto sedāpissa kacchehi muccanti.
tika-s0403t:698_10: Uṇhanti cettha aggisantāpova veditabbo sūriyasantāpassa parato vuccamānattā.
tika-s0403t:699_0: Yo ca dve tayo vāre bhattaṃ vā pānīyaṃ vā alabhamānopi anamatagge saṃsāre attano pettivisayūpapattiṃ
tika-s0403t:699_2: Ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasamphassehi phuṭṭho cepi tiracchānūpapattiṃ paccavekkhitvā avedhanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatiyeva.
tika-s0403t:699_3: Sarīsapasamphassena phuṭṭho cāpi anamatagge saṃsāre sīhabyagghādimukhesu anekavāraṃ parivattitapubbabhāvaṃ
tika-s0403t:699_4: paccavekkhitvā avedhanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatiyeva padhāniyatthero viya,
tika-s0403t:699_7: Theraṃ kira khaṇḍacelavihāre kaṇikārapadhāniyaghare ariyavaṃsadhammaṃ suṇantaññeva ghoraviso sappo ḍaṃsi.
tika-s0403t:699_8: Thero jānitvāpi pasannacitto nisinno dhammaṃyeva suṇāti,
tika-s0403t:699_10: Thero upasampadamāḷaṃ ādiṃ katvā sīlaṃ paccavekkhitvā “visuddhasīlomhī”ti pītiṃ uppādesi,
tika-s0403t:699_11: saha pītuppādā visaṃ nivattitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi.
tika-s0403t:699_12: Thero tattheva cittekaggataṃ labhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-s0403t:700_0: Yo pana akkosavasena durutte duruttattāyeva ca durāgate api antimavatthusaññite vacanapathe sutvā khantiguṇaṃyeva
tika-s0403t:700_6: Taṃ aññataro mahāthero adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto “dīghabhāṇako ‘ariyavaṃsaṃ kathemī’ti sabbarattiṃ kolāhalaṃ karotī”tiādīhi akkosi.
tika-s0403t:700_7: Ubhopi ca attano attano vihāraṃ gacchantā gāvutamattaṃ ekapathena agamaṃsu.
tika-s0403t:700_9: Tato yattha dvinnaṃ vihārānaṃ maggo bhijjati,
tika-s0403t:700_10: tattha ṭhatvā dīghabhāṇakatthero taṃ vanditvā “eso, bhante,
tika-s0403t:700_13: Theropi vihāraṃ gantvā pāde pakkhāletvā nisīdi.
tika-s0403t:700_15: sakalagāvutaṃ paribhāsantaṃ na kiñci avocutthā”ti āha.
tika-s0403t:701_0: Vacanameva tadatthaṃ ñāpetukāmānañca patho upāyoti āha “vacanameva vacanapatho”ti.
tika-s0403t:701_5: Cittalapabbate padhāniyattherassa kira rattiṃ padhānena vītināmetvā ṭhitassa udaravāto uppajjati.
tika-s0403t:701_6: So taṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto āvattati parivattati.
tika-s0403t:701_12: Thero vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanto muhuttena anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyi.
tika-s0403t:701_13: Evaṃ sabbatthāti “uṇhena phuṭṭhassa sītaṃ patthayato”tiādinā sabbattha uṇhādinimittaṃ kāmāsavuppatti veditabbā.
tika-s0403t:701_14: Natthi sugatibhave sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vāti aniṭṭhaṃ sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0403t:701_15: Attaggāhe sati attaniyaggāhoti āha “mayhaṃ sītaṃ uṇhanti gāho diṭṭhāsavo”ti.
tika-s0403t:702_1: kiṃ mama jīvitena vā maraṇena vā”ti evaṃ cintetvāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0403t:702_14: Akāsi vāti tādisaṃ anācāraṃ akāsi vā.
tika-s0403t:702_18: Tathā hi bhagavatā “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatī”ti sīlasaṃvaravibhajane ācāragocarasampattiṃ dassentena “atthi anācāro,
tika-s0403t:702_20: “Caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjetī”ti vacanato hatthiādiparivajjanampi bhagavato vacanānuṭṭhānanti katvā ācārasīlamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:703_2: kusalappaṭipakkhatopītiādīhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ vitakko akusaloti attho.
tika-s0403t:703_4: Ettha ca akusalotiādinā diṭṭhadhammikaṃ kāmavitakkassa ādīnavaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0403t:703_6: Attabyābādhāya saṃvattatītiādīsupi imināva nayena ādīnavavibhāvanā veditabbā.
tika-s0403t:703_7: Uppannassa kāmavitakkassa anadhivāsanaṃ nāma puna tādisassa anuppādanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:703_8: Taṃ panassa pahānaṃ vinodanaṃ byantikaraṇaṃ anabhāvagamananti ca vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti pāḷiyaṃ –
tika-s0403t:703_9: “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”ti vatvā “pajahatī”tiādi vuttanti tamatthaṃ dassento “anadhivāsento kiṃ karotī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t:703_11: na samucchedoti dassetuṃ “vinodetī”tiādi vuttanti vikkhambhanavaseneva attho dassito.
tika-s0403t:703_12: Uppannuppanneti tesaṃ pāpavitakkānaṃ uppādāvatthāgahaṇaṃ vā kataṃ siyā anavasesaggahaṇaṃ vā.
tika-s0403t:703_15: Anavasesaggahaṇaṃ byāpanicchāyaṃ hotīti dassetuṃ “satakkhattumpi uppannuppanne”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:704_0: Ñātivitakkoti “amhākaṃ ñātayo sukhajīvino sampattiyuttā”tiādinā gehassitapemavasena ñātake ārabbha uppannavitakko.
tika-s0403t:704_1: Janapadavitakkoti “amhākaṃ janapado subhikkho sampannasasso ramaṇīyo”tiādinā gehassitapemavasena janapadaṃ ārabbha uppannavitakko.
tika-s0403t:704_2: Ukkuṭikappadhānādīhi dukkhe nijjiṇṇe samparāye sattā sukhī honti amarāti dukkarakārikāya paṭisaṃyutto amaratthāya vitakko.
tika-s0403t:704_3: Taṃ vā ārabbha amarāvikkhepadiṭṭhisahagato amaro ca so vitakko cāti amarāvitakko.
tika-s0403t:704_4: Parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyuttoti paresu upaṭṭhākādīsu sahananditādivasena pavatto anuddayatāpatirūpako gehassitapemappaṭisaṃyutto vitakko.
tika-s0403t:704_5: Lābhasakkārasilokappaṭisaṃyuttoti cīvarādilābhena ca sakkārena ca kittisaddena ca ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭisaṃyutto.
tika-s0403t:704_6: Anavaññattippaṭisaṃyuttoti “aho vata maṃ pare na avajāneyyuṃ,
tika-s0403t:705_0: Kāmavitakko kāmasaṅkappanasabhāvato kāmāsavappattiyā sātisayattā ca kāmanākāroti āha “kāmavitakko panettha kāmāsavo”ti.
tika-s0403t:705_2: Kāmavitakkādike vinodeti attano santānato nīharati etenāti vinodanaṃ,
tika-s0403t:706_0: “Satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiyo paripūrentī”ti vacanato vijjāvimuttīnaṃ anadhigamo
tika-s0403t:706_2: Vuttavipariyāyena bhagavato orasaputtabhāvādivasena ca bhāvanāya ānisaṃso veditabbo.
tika-s0403t:706_3: Thomentoti āsavapahānassa dukkarattā tāya eva dukkarakiriyāya taṃ abhitthavanto.
tika-s0403t:709_2: Ettha puttasīsena dārapariggahaṃ puttadāresu uppilo viya.
tika-s0403t:709_3: Tena tesaṃ rogādihetu sokābhibhavena ca cittassa saṃkiliṭṭhataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0403t:712_3: So kira sāvatthiyaṃ hatthiācariyassa putto bhagavato santike pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā sukhumesu
tika-s0403t:712_6: “therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhidhammakathaṃ kathentānaṃ antarantarā kathaṃ opātetī”ti.
tika-s0403t:712_7: Tattha antarantarā kathaṃ opātetīti therehi vuccamānassa kathāpabandhassa antare antare attano kathaṃ pavesetīti attho.
tika-s0403t:712_13: Kiṭṭhakhādakoti kiṭṭhaṭṭhāne uppannasassañhi kiṭṭhanti vuttaṃ kāraṇūpacārena.
tika-s0403t:713_0: Gihibhāve vaṇṇaṃ kathesīti kassapasammāsambuddhassa kira sāsane dve sahāyakā ahesuṃ,
tika-s0403t:713_2: Tesu eko anabhirato gihibhāve cittaṃ uppādetvā itarassa ārocesi.
tika-s0403t:713_5: So taṃ sutvā abhiramitvā puna ekadivasaṃ tādise citte uppanne taṃ etadavoca – “mayhaṃ, āvuso,
tika-s0403t:713_8: So pattacīvaralobhena tassa gihibhāve ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā pabbajjāya ādīnavaṃ kathesi.
tika-s0403t:713_9: Tassa taṃ sutvāva gihibhāvato cittaṃ nivattetvā pabbajjāyameva abhirami.
tika-s0403t:713_10: Evamesa tadā sīlavantassa bhikkhuno gihibhāve ānisaṃsakathāya kathitattā idāni cha vāre vibbhamitvā sattamavāre
tika-s0403t:713_11: pabbajitvā mahāmoggallānassa mahākoṭṭhikattherassa ca abhidhammakathaṃ kathentānaṃ antarantarā kathaṃ opātesi.
tika-s0403t:713_13: So mahāsāvakassa kathite patiṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto vibbhamitvā gihi jāto.
tika-s0403t:713_15: tasmā vibbhamitvā dvīhatīhaccayena poṭṭhapādassa santikaṃ gato.
tika-s0403t:713_19: ehi pabbajituṃ dāni te vaṭṭatī”ti taṃ gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
tika-s0403t:713_21: Tena vuttaṃ “sattame vāre pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇī”ti.
tika-s0403t:716_5: Phassavasena nibbattattāti dvayadvayasamāpattiyaṃ aññamaññaṃ samphassavasena nibbattattā,
tika-s0403t:716_9: bhavapaccayā jātī”ti iminā cānukkamena phassasamuṭṭhānattā imassa kāyassa phassavasena nibbattattāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:716_15: “Kāyabandhanassa anto jīrati sā haritantaṃ vā panthantaṃ vā selantaṃ vā udakantaṃ vā”tiādīsu mariyādāyaṃ.
tika-s0403t:716_20: Sabbapaccayasaṅkhayo hi dukkhassa abhāvo koṭītipi vuccati.
tika-s0403t:716_22: “Iṅgha tāva suttantaṃ vā gāthāyo vā abhidhammaṃ vā pariyāpuṇassu,
tika-s0403t:716_23: suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā”ti ca ādīsu padapūraṇe.
tika-s0403t:720_1: Aṭṭhame nibbattivasena apāyasaṃvattaniyena vā kammunā apāyesu niyuttoti āpāyiko nerayikoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0403t:720_2: Avīcimhi uppajjitvā tattha āyukappasaññitaṃ antarakappaṃ tiṭṭhatīti kappaṭṭho.
tika-s0403t:720_5: Bhinnakālato paṭṭhāya bījaṃ bījatthāya na upakappati.
tika-s0403t:720_8: Avātātapahatānīti vātena ca ātapena ca na hatāni nirojataṃ na pāpitāni.
tika-s0403t:720_9: Nirojañhi kasaṭaṃ bījaṃ bījatthāya na upakappati.
tika-s0403t:720_11: kārassa rassattaṃ katvā pāḷiyaṃ “sāradānī”ti vuttanti āha “sārādānī”ti.
tika-s0403t:720_15: Sukhasayitānīti cattāro māse koṭṭhe pakkhittaniyāmeneva sukhasayitāni suṭṭhu sannicitāni.
tika-s0403t:720_23: Tasmā abhido aḍḍharattanti abhinne aḍḍharattasamayeti attho.
tika-s0403t:720_24: Puṇṇamāsiyañhi gaganamajjhassa purato vā pacchato vā cande ṭhite aḍḍharattasamayo bhinno nāma hoti,
tika-s0403t:720_25: majjhe eva pana ṭhite abhinno nāma.
tika-s0403t:721_0: Suppabuddhasunakkhattādayoti ettha suppabuddho kira sākiyo “mama dhītaraṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhanto,
tika-s0403t:721_1: mama puttaṃ pabbājetvā tassa veriṭṭhāne ṭhito cā”ti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi satthari āghātaṃ bandhitvā ekadivasaṃ
tika-s0403t:721_2: “na dāni nimantitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhuñjituṃ dassāmī”ti gamanamaggaṃ pidahitvā antaravīthiyaṃ suraṃ pivanto nisīdi.
tika-s0403t:721_3: Athassa satthari bhikkhusaṅghaparivute taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgate “satthā āgato”ti ārocesuṃ. So āha –
tika-s0403t:721_8: Satthā mātulassa santikā maggaṃ alabhitvā tatova nivatti.
tika-s0403t:721_15: Bhāriyaṃ tena kammaṃ kataṃ mādisassa buddhassa maggaṃ adentena,
tika-s0403t:721_16: ito sattame divase heṭṭhāpāsāde pāsādamūle pathaviyā pavisissatī”ti ācikkhi.
tika-s0403t:722_0: Sunakkhattopi pubbe bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dibbacakkhuparikammaṃ pucchi.
tika-s0403t:722_2: So dibbacakkhuṃ nibbattetvā ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā olokento devaloke nandanavanacittalatāvanaphārusakavanamissakavanesu
tika-s0403t:722_3: dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāne devaputte ca devadhītaro ca disvā –
tika-s0403t:722_4: “etesaṃ evarūpāya attabhāvasampattiyā ṭhitānaṃ kira madhuro nu kho saddo bhavissatī”ti saddaṃ sotukāmo
tika-s0403t:722_7: “dibbasotadhātussa upanissayo natthī”ti ñatvā parikammaṃ na kathesi.
tika-s0403t:722_8: Na hi buddhā yaṃ na bhavissati,
tika-s0403t:722_12: so mayhaṃ ‘sampajjatu vā mā vā sampajjatū’ti kathesi.
tika-s0403t:722_13: Ahaṃ pana paccattapurisakārena taṃ nibbattetvā dibbasotadhātuparikammaṃ pucchiṃ,
tika-s0403t:722_15: Addhā evaṃ hoti ‘ayaṃ rājapabbajito dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ nibbattetvā,
tika-s0403t:722_19: mayā samasamo bhavissatī’ti issāmacchariyavasena mayhaṃ na kathetī”ti bhiyyoso āghātaṃ bandhitvā kāsāyāni
tika-s0403t:722_20: chaḍḍetvā gihibhāvaṃ patvāpi na tuṇhībhūto vihāsi.
tika-s0403t:722_21: Dasabalaṃ pana asatā tucchena abbhācikkhitvā apāyūpago ahosi.
tika-s0403t:722_25: sunakkhatto licchaviputto mayā vuccamāno apakkameva imasmā dhammavinayā,
tika-s0403t:722_27: Tena vuttaṃ “aparepi suppabuddhasunakkhattādayo bhagavatā ñātāvā”ti. Ādi-
tika-s0403t:723_0: Susīmo paribbājakoti evaṃnāmako vedaṅgesu kusalo paṇḍito paribbājako.
tika-s0403t:723_1: Aññatitthiyā hi parihīnalābhasakkārasilokā “samaṇo gotamo na jātigottādīni ārabbha lābhaggappatto jāto,
tika-s0403t:723_2: kaviseṭṭho panesa uttamakavitāya sāvakānaṃ bandhaṃ bandhitvā deti.
tika-s0403t:723_3: Te taṃ uggaṇhitvā upaṭṭhākānaṃ upanisinnakathampi anumodanampi sarabhaññampīti evamādīni kathenti.
tika-s0403t:723_5: Sace mayaṃ yaṃ samaṇo gotamā jānāti,
tika-s0403t:723_7: attano samayaṃ tattha pakkhipitvā mayampi upaṭṭhākānaṃ katheyyāma.
tika-s0403t:723_9: Ko nu kho samaṇassa gotamassa santike pabbajitvā khippameva uggaṇhituṃ sakkhissatī”ti evaṃ cintetvā “susimo
tika-s0403t:723_14: taṃ mayaṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā gihīnaṃ bhāsissāma,
tika-s0403t:723_15: evaṃ mayampi sakkatā bhavissāma garukatā mānitā pūjitā lābhino cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārāna”nti.
tika-s0403t:724_0: Atha susīmo paribbājako tesaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā yenānando tenupasaṅkami,
tika-s0403t:724_2: Thero ca taṃ ādāya bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
tika-s0403t:724_3: Bhagavā pana cintesi “ayaṃ paribbājako titthiyasamaye ‘ahaṃ pāṭiekko satthā’ti paṭijānamāno carati,
tika-s0403t:724_6: udāhu mayhaṃ vā mama sāvakānaṃ dhammakathāya pasanno”ti.
tika-s0403t:724_7: Athassa ekaṭṭhānepi pasādābhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ mama sāsane ‘dhammaṃ thenessāmī’ti pabbajati,
tika-s0403t:724_9: nipphatti nu kho kīdisā”ti olokento “kiñcāpi ‘dhammaṃ thenessāmī’ti pabbajati,
tika-s0403t:724_10: katipāheneva pana ghaṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti ñatvā “tenahānanda,
tika-s0403t:724_12: Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “evaṃ bhagavatā ko ñāto?
tika-s0403t:725_0: Santatimahāmattoti so kira ekasmiṃ kāle rañño pasenadissa paccantaṃ kupitaṃ vūpasametvā āgato.
tika-s0403t:725_1: Athassa rājā tuṭṭho satta divasāni rajjaṃ datvā ekaṃ naccagītakusalaṃ itthiṃ adāsi.
tika-s0403t:725_2: So satta divasāni surāmadamatto hutvā sattame divase sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍito hatthikkhandhavaragato
tika-s0403t:725_3: nahānatitthaṃ gacchanto satthāraṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ dvārantare disvā hatthikkhandhavaragatova sīsaṃ
tika-s0403t:725_5: Satthā sitaṃ katvā “ko nu kho, bhante,
tika-s0403t:725_6: sitapātukaraṇe hetū”ti ānandattherena puṭṭho sitakāraṇaṃ ācikkhanto āha – “passasi, ānanda,
tika-s0403t:725_8: ajjeva sabbābharaṇappaṭimaṇḍito mama santikaṃ āgantvā cātuppadikagāthāvasāne arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyissatī”ti.
tika-s0403t:728_1: Navame parihāyati attano phalaṃ pariggahetvā vattati,
tika-s0403t:728_2: tassa vā kāraṇabhāvaṃ upagacchatīti pariyāyoti idha kāraṇaṃ vuttanti āha “nibbijjhanakāraṇa”nti.
tika-s0403t:729_2: ahatānaṃ vatthānaṃ diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭi”nti ettha hi paṭalaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho.
tika-s0403t:729_4: vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī”ti ettha rāsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho.
tika-s0403t:729_7: kayirā mālāguṇe bahū”ti ettha bandhanaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho.
tika-s0403t:729_9: Kāmarāgassa saṃyojanassa paccayabhāvena vatthukāmesupi bandhanaṭṭho rāsaṭṭho vā guṇaṭṭho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t:729_18: Kāmūpasañhitāti kāmarāgena upecca sambandhanīyā sambandhā kātabbā.
tika-s0403t:729_21: Evamettha vatthukāmaṃ paṭikkhipitvā kilesakāmo vutto tasseva vasena tesampi kāmabhāvasiddhito,
tika-s0403t:729_22: kilesakāmassapi iṭṭhavedanā diṭṭhādisampayogabhedena pavattiākārabhedena ca atthi vicittakāti tato visesetuṃ “citravicitrārammaṇānī”ti āha,
tika-s0403t:730_0: Athettha dhīrā vinayanti chandanti atha etesu ārammaṇesu dhitisampannā paṇḍitā chandarāgaṃ vinayanti.
tika-s0403t:731_1: atthato pana tassa kāmassa anurūpanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t:735_1: Dasame tathāgatabalānīti aññehi asādhāraṇāni tathāgatasseva balāni.
tika-s0403t:735_5: na tādisāni tadaññesaṃ kadāci uppajjantīti aññehi asādhāraṇāni.
tika-s0403t:735_6: Imameva hi yathāvuttaṃ lesaṃ apekkhitvā sādhāraṇabhāvato āsayānusayañāṇādīsu eva asādhāraṇasamaññā niruḷhā.
tika-s0403t:735_7: Yathā pubbabuddhānaṃ balāni puññassa sampattiyā āgatāni,
tika-s0403t:735_12: Paṭivedhañāṇañceva desanāñāṇañcāti ettha paññāya pabhāvitaṃ attano ariyaphalāvahaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t:736_0: Ṭhānañca ṭhānato pajānātīti kāraṇañca kāraṇato pajānāti.
tika-s0403t:736_1: Yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttitāya uppajjati ceva pavattati ca,
tika-s0403t:736_3: Bhagavā “ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ hetū paccayā uppādāya,
tika-s0403t:736_5: ye ye dhammā yeyaṃ yeyaṃ dhammānaṃ na hetū na paccayā uppādāya,
tika-s0403t:736_6: taṃ taṃ aṭṭhāna”nti pajānanto ṭhānato aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
tika-s0403t:737_1: tāni pana samādiyitvā katāni hontīti āha “samādiyitvā katāna”nti.
tika-s0403t:737_2: Kammameva vā kammasamādānanti etena “samādāna”nti saddassa apubbatthābhāvaṃ dasseti muttagatasadde gatasaddassa viya.
tika-s0403t:738_0: Catunnaṃ jhānānanti paccanīkajjhāpanaṭṭhena ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṭṭhena ca catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ.
tika-s0403t:738_2: Aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānanti “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ.
tika-s0403t:738_5: Ettha ca paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhannaṃ samādhītipi nāmaṃ,
tika-s0403t:738_8: Hānabhāgiyaṃ dhammanti appaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ kāmādipakkhandanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:738_9: Visesabhāgiyaṃ dhammanti paguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ dutiyajjhānādipakkhandanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:738_11: Tehi pana jhānānaṃ taṃsabhāvatā dhammasaddena vuttā.
tika-s0403t:738_14: Tañhi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamassa paccayattā “vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:738_15: Ye pana “nirodhato phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānanti pāḷi natthī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0403t:738_16: Te “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti imāya pāḷiyaṃ paṭisedhetabbā.
tika-s0403t:749_1: Chaṭṭhe paṭippassambhanaṃ paṭippassaddhīti atthato ekanti āha “na paṭippassaddhiladdhenāti kilesappaṭippassaddhiyā aladdhenā”ti.
tika-s0403t:749_2: Sukkapakkhe santenātiādīsu aṅgasantatāya ārammaṇasantatāya sabbakilesasantatāya ca santena,
tika-s0403t:752_1: Sattame tasmiṃ tasmiṃ viseseti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sacchikātabbe visese.
tika-s0403t:752_8: avasāne pana chaṭṭhābhiññāya arahattaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0403t:752_10: Yañhi taṃ tatra tatra sakkhibhabbatāsaṅkhātaṃ iddhividhapaccanubhavanādi,
tika-s0403t:752_14: Arahattampi “kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmī”ti anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā chaṭṭhābhiññaṃ nibbattentassa kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t:752_17: Atha vā sati āyataneti tassa tassa visesādhigamassa upanissayasaṅkhāte kāraṇe satīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t:753_7: nibbedhabhāgiyo samādhī”ti iminā nayena sabbasamāpattiyo vitthāretvā hānabhāgiyādiattho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t:753_8: Tattha paṭhamajjhānassa lābhinti yvāyaṃ appaguṇassa paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī, taṃ.
tika-s0403t:753_9: Kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācarantīti tato vuṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti tudanti,
tika-s0403t:753_10: tassa kāmānatītassa kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi hāyati parihāyati,
tika-s0403t:753_13: Sati santiṭṭhatīti idaṃ micchāsatiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:753_14: Yassa hi paṭhamajjhānānurūpasabhāvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato disvā assādayamānā abhinandamānā nikanti hoti,
tika-s0403t:753_15: tassa nikantivasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi neva hāyati na vaḍḍhati,
tika-s0403t:753_18: Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato manasikaroto ārammaṇavasena avitakkasahagatā.
tika-s0403t:753_19: Saññāmanasikārā samudācarantīti paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya codenti tudanti.
tika-s0403t:753_20: Tassa upari dutiyajjhānānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi visesabhūtassa
tika-s0403t:754_0: Nibbidāsahagatāti tameva paṭhamajjhānalābhiṃ jhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ nibbidāsaṅkhātena vipassanāñāṇena sahagatā.
tika-s0403t:754_1: Vipassanāñāṇañhi jhānaṅgesu pabhedena upaṭṭhahantesu nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati,
tika-s0403t:754_5: Vipassanāñāṇañhi sakkā iminā maggena virāgaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikātunti pavattito “virāgūpasaṃhita”nti vuccati.
tika-s0403t:754_7: Tassa tesaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena paṭhamajjhānasamādhi ariyamaggappaṭivedhassa padaṭṭhānatāya “nibbedhabhāgiyo”ti vutto.
tika-s0403t:762_1: Catutthe yathāvuttadhammādīsu tassa kilesanimittaṃ dukkhaṃ anavassananti “sukhasomanassabahulo viharatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:762_3: Yavati tena phalaṃ missitaṃ viya hotīti yoni,
tika-s0403t:765_1: Pañcame āgacchanti etena kusalā vā akusalā vāti āgamanaṃ,
tika-s0403t:765_4: Evaṃ dhamme manasikaroto kusalā vā akusalā vā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantīti evaṃ jānanto.
tika-s0403t:765_5: Apagacchanti kusalā vā akusalā vā etenāti apagamanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:765_8: Evaṃ dhamme manasikaroto kusalā vā akusalā vā dhammā nābhivaḍḍhantīti evaṃ jānanto.
tika-s0403t:765_10: Idañca accāyikakicce vā bhaye vā uppanne tassa tikicchanatthaṃ ṭhānuppattiyā kāraṇajānanavasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:768_0: 80-81. Chaṭṭhe sampatteti kilese sampatte. Sattamaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0403t:776_3: Niggaṇhātīti accāraddhavīriyatādīhi uddhataṃ cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhato rakkhaṇavasena niggaṇhāti.
tika-s0403t:776_4: Paggaṇhātīti atisithilavīriyatādīhi līnaṃ cittaṃ kosajjapātato rakkhaṇavasena paggaṇhāti.
tika-s0403t:776_5: Sampahaṃsetīti samappavattacittaṃ tathāpavattiyaṃ paññāya toseti uttejeti vā.
tika-s0403t:776_6: Yadā vā paññāpayogamandatāya upasamasukhānadhigamena vā nirassādaṃ cittaṃ bhāvanāya na pakkhandati,
tika-s0403t:776_7: tadā jātiādīni saṃvegavatthūni paccavekkhitvā sampahaṃseti samuttejeti.
tika-s0403t:776_8: Ajjhupekkhatīti yadā pana cittaṃ alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ sammadeva bhāvanāvītiṃ otiṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t:776_9: tadā paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu kiñci byāpāraṃ akatvā samappavattesu assesu sārathī viya ajjhupekkhati,
tika-s0403t:776_11: Paṇītādhimuttikoti paṇīte uttame maggaphale adhimutto ninnapoṇapabbhāro.
tika-s0403t:779_4: Bhavaṅgapaññāya pana paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgaṃ lokuttarassa paccayo na hoti,
tika-s0403t:779_6: Abhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu sammattaniyāmasaṅkhātaṃ ariyamaggaṃ okkamituṃ adhigantuṃ abhabbo.
tika-s0403t:784_5: Sā pana mettāvatā mettāvasena pāricariyāti āha “mettāyuttāya pāricariyāyā”ti.
tika-s0403t:784_7: Pariciṇṇasatthukena sāvakena nāma satthuno yāva dhammena kātabbā pāricariyā,
tika-s0403t:798_2: ubhato ubhohi bhāgehi vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto ekadesasarūpekasesanayena.
tika-s0403t:798_3: Dvīhi bhāgehīti karaṇe nissakke cetaṃ bahuvacanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:798_6: maggena samucchedavimokkhena vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti evaṃ pavatto tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravādo,
tika-s0403t:798_7: “nāmakāyato rūpakāyato ca vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti evaṃ pavatto tipiṭakamahārakkhitattheravādo,
tika-s0403t:798_9: maggena samucchedavimokkhena ekavāraṃ vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti evaṃ pavatto tipiṭakacūḷābhayattheravādo
tika-s0403t:798_10: cāti imesaṃ tiṇṇampi theravādānaṃ ekajjhaṃ saṅgaho katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:798_11: Ettha ca paṭhamavāde dvīhi bhāgehi vimutto ubhatobhāgavimutto vutto,
tika-s0403t:798_13: tatiyavāde dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ayametesaṃ visesoti.
tika-s0403t:799_1: Kāmañcettha rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānampi arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ viya duvaṅgikaṃ āneñjappattanti vuccati.
tika-s0403t:799_2: Taṃ pana padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma na hoti rūpakāyato avimuttattā.
tika-s0403t:799_5: tasmā tato vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto na hotīti āha “catunnaṃ arūpa…pe…
tika-s0403t:799_9: Na hi arahattaṃ patto anāgāmī nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t:799_10: “Rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādike nirodhasamāpattiante aṭṭha vimokkhe vatvā –
tika-s0403t:800_1: bhikkhu ime aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
tika-s0403t:800_2: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
tika-s0403t:801_2: idha pana sabbaubhatobhāgavimutte saṅgahaṇatthaṃ “pañcavidho hotī”ti vatvā “pāḷi panettha…pe…
tika-s0403t:802_4: ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā,
tika-s0403t:802_6: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
tika-s0403t:803_2: Yathāvuttesu hi pañcasu purimā cattāro samāpattisīsaṃ nirodhaṃ na samāpajjantīti pariyāyena ubhatobhāgavimuttā nāma.
tika-s0403t:803_3: Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī anāgāmī taṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattoti nippariyāyena ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭho nāma.
tika-s0403t:804_5: Aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharatīti aṭṭha samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā nāmakāyato paṭilabhitvā viharati.
tika-s0403t:804_6: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti vipassanāpaññāya saṅkhāragataṃ,
tika-s0403t:804_7: maggapaññāya cattāri saccāni passitvā cattāropi āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
tika-s0403t:804_10: dassanakāraṇā pana parikkhīṇā disvā parikkhīṇāti vuttā dassanāyattaparikkhayattā.
tika-s0403t:804_11: Evañhi dassanaṃ āsavānaṃ khayassa purimakiriyābhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:805_1: na tassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtena aṭṭhavimokkhasaṅkhātena sātisayena samādhināti paññāvimutto.
tika-s0403t:805_2: Yo ariyo anadhigataaṭṭhavimokkho sabbaso āsavehi vimutto,
tika-s0403t:805_4: Adhigatepi hi rūpajjhānavimokkhe na so sātisayasamādhinissitoti na tassa vasena ubhatobhāgavimuttatā hotīti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0403t:805_5: Arūpajjhānesu pana ekasmimpi sati ubhatobhāgavimuttoyeva nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t:805_6: Tena hi aṭṭhavimokkhekadesena taṃnāmadānasamatthena aṭṭhavimokkhalābhītveva vuccati.
tika-s0403t:805_7: Samudāye hi pavatto vohāro avayavepi dissati yathā taṃ “sattisayo”ti anavasesato āsavānaṃ parikkhīṇattā.
tika-s0403t:805_9: Evañhi arūpajjhānekadesābhāvepi aṭṭhavimokkhapaṭikkhepo na hotīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t:805_10: Arūpāvacarajjhānesu hi ekasmimpi sati ubhatobhāgavimuttoyeva nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t:806_3: Taṃ phuṭṭhānantarakālameva sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikato sacchikaraṇūpāyenāti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t:806_5: Yo hi arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato nāmakāyekadesato ca vikkhambhanavimokkhena vimutto,
tika-s0403t:806_6: tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti,
tika-s0403t:806_8: Nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikato hoti,
tika-s0403t:806_9: tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchi karotīti “kāyasakkhī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0403t:806_13: Ayaṃ catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ ekekato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā kāyasakkhibhāvaṃ pattānaṃ catunnaṃ,
tika-s0403t:806_14: nirodhā vuṭṭhāya aggamaggappattaanāgāmino ca vasena ubhatobhāgavimutto viya pañcavidho nāma hotīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0403t:807_0: Diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t:807_2: Etena catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā nirodhassa pattataṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0403t:807_8: evaṃ ayampi sukkhavipassako catūhi arūpajjhānehi vuṭṭhāya diṭṭhippattabhāvappattā cattāro cāti pañcavidho hotīti veditabbo.
tika-s0403t:807_12: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhasaccanti yāthāvato pajānāti.
tika-s0403t:807_13: Yasmā pana taṇhā dukkhaṃ janeti nibbatteti,
tika-s0403t:807_16: Yasmā pana idaṃ dukkhañca samudayo ca nibbānaṃ patvā nirujjhati,
tika-s0403t:807_19: Ariyo pana aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo taṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0403t:807_20: tena taṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
tika-s0403t:807_23: Tathāgatappaveditāti tathāgatena bodhimaṇḍe paṭividdhā viditā pākaṭā katā.
tika-s0403t:808_1: Etena sabbathā avimuttassapi saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0403t:808_3: Kiṃ pana nesaṃ kilesappahāne nānattaṃ atthīti? Natthi.
tika-s0403t:808_4: Atha kasmā saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti?
tika-s0403t:808_6: Diṭṭhippatto hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appadukkhena akasirena akilamantova sakkoti vikkhambhituṃ,
tika-s0403t:808_7: saddhāvimutto pana dukkhena kasirena kilamanto sakkoti vikkhambhituṃ,
tika-s0403t:808_10: Saddahantassāti “ekaṃsato ayaṃ paṭipadā kilesakkhayaṃ āvahati sammāsambuddhena bhāsitattā”ti evaṃ saddahantassa.
tika-s0403t:808_11: Yasmā panassa aniccānupassanādīhi niccasaññāpahānavasena bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ passato tattha tattha paccakkhatāpi atthi,
tika-s0403t:808_14: Ettha ca pubbabhāgamaggabhāvanāti vacanena āgamanīyanānattena diṭṭhippattasaddhāvimuttānaṃ paññānānattaṃ hotīti dassitaṃ.
tika-s0403t:808_16: paññāya nānattaṃ atthiyevā”ti vatvā “āgamanīyanānatteneva saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:809_0: Ārammaṇaṃ yāthāvato dhāreti avadhāretīti dhammo, paññā.
tika-s0403t:809_1: Taṃ paññāsaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ adhimattatāya pubbaṅgamaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ anussaratīti dhammānusārī.
tika-s0403t:809_5: saddhāpubbaṅgamaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetī”ti imamatthaṃ eseva nayoti atidisati.
tika-s0403t:809_9: Paññā vā puggalaṃ vāheti nibbānābhimukhaṃ gametīti paññāvāhī.
tika-s0403t:809_10: Saddhāvāhīti etthāpi iminā nayeneva attho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t:809_13: Tato eva visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva cettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t:812_3: Evaṃ puggaloti iminā kāraṇena ekavāraṃ nimuggo nimuggoyeva so hoti.
tika-s0403t:812_4: Etassa hi puna bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti vadanti makkhaligosālādayo viya.
tika-s0403t:812_6: Sādhu saddhā kusalesūti kusaladhammesu saddhā nāma sāhu laddhakāti ummujjati,
tika-s0403t:812_11: Evaṃ puggaloti “evaṃ sādhu saddhā”ti imesaṃ saddhādīnaṃ vasena ekavāraṃ ummujjitvā tesaṃ parihāniyā puna nimujjatiyeva devadattādayo viya.
tika-s0403t:812_12: Devadatto hi aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattetvāpi puna buddhānaṃ paṭipakkhatāya tehi guṇehi
tika-s0403t:812_13: parihīno ruhiruppādakammaṃ saṅghabhedakammañca katvā kāyassa bhedā dutiyacittavārena cuticittamanantarā
tika-s0403t:812_15: Kokāliko dve aggasāvake upavaditvā padumaniraye nibbatto.
tika-s0403t:813_0: Neva hāyati no vaḍḍhatīti appahonakakālepi na hāyati,
tika-s0403t:813_3: Ekacco hi agāriko appahonakakāle pakkhikabhattaṃ vassikaṃ vā upanibandhāpesi,
tika-s0403t:813_5: Anagārikopi ādimhi appahonakakāle uddesaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ vā gaṇhāti,
tika-s0403t:813_6: medhāvī balavīriyasampattiyā pahonakakāle tato uttariṃ na karoti.
tika-s0403t:813_7: Evaṃ puggaloti evaṃ imāya saddhādīnaṃ ṭhitiyā puggalo ummujjitvā ṭhito nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t:813_8: Ummujjitvā pataratīti sakadāgāmipuggalo kilesatanutāya uṭṭhahitvā gantabbadisābhimukho tarati nāma.
tika-s0403t:814_1: Ime pana satta puggalā udakopamena dīpitā.
tika-s0403t:814_2: Satta kira jaṅghavāṇijā addhānamaggappaṭipannā antarāmagge ekaṃ puṇṇanadiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
tika-s0403t:814_3: Tesu paṭhamaṃ otiṇṇo udakabhīruko puriso otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva nimujjitvā puna saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi,
tika-s0403t:814_5: Dutiyo otiṇṇaṭṭhāne nimujjitvā sakiṃ uṭṭhahitvā puna nimuggo uṭṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi,
tika-s0403t:814_7: Tatiyo nimujjitvā uṭṭhito majjhe nadiyā ṭhatvā neva orato āgantuṃ,
tika-s0403t:814_11: Chaṭṭho taṃ disvā pārimatīraṃ gantvā kaṭippamāṇe udake ṭhito.
tika-s0403t:814_12: Sattamo pārimatīraṃ gantvā gandhacuṇṇādīhi nhatvā varavatthādīni nivāsetvā surabhivilepanaṃ vilimpitvā
tika-s0403t:814_13: nīluppalamālādīni pilandhitvā nānālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍito mahānagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādamāruhitvā uttamabhojanaṃ bhuñjati.
tika-s0403t:815_0: Tattha jaṅghavāṇijā viya ime satta puggalā,
tika-s0403t:815_2: paṭhamassa udakabhīrukassa purisassa otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva nimujjanaṃ viya micchādiṭṭhikassa vaṭṭe nimujjanaṃ,
tika-s0403t:815_3: ummujjitvā nimujjanapuriso viya saddhādīnaṃ uppattimatthakena ummujjitvā tāsaṃ hāniyā nimuggapuggalo,
tika-s0403t:815_4: majjhe nadiyā ṭhatvā viya saddhādīnaṃ ṭhitiyā ṭhitipuggalo,
tika-s0403t:815_7: taritvā kaṭimatte udake ṭhitapuriso viya anāvaṭṭadhammattā anāgāmī,
tika-s0403t:815_8: nhatvā pārimatīraṃ uttaritvā thale ṭhitapuriso viya cattāro oghe atikkamitvā nibbānathale ṭhito khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo,
tika-s0403t:815_9: thale ṭhitapurisassa nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādaṃ āruyha uttamabhojanabhuñjanaṃ viya khīṇāsavassa nibbānārammaṇasamāpattiṃ
tika-s0403t:818_1: Chaṭṭhe “idha samasīsī kathito”ti vatvā evaṃ samasīsitaṃ vibhajitvā idhādhippetaṃ dassetuṃ “so catubbidho hotī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t:818_5: Yo cakkhurogādīsu aññatarasmiṃ sati “ito anuṭṭhito arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
tika-s0403t:818_6: athassa arahattañca rogato vuṭṭhānañca ekakālameva hoti,
tika-s0403t:818_9: Yo ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu aññataraṃ adhiṭṭhāya “avikopetvāva arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
tika-s0403t:818_10: Athassa arahattappatti ca iriyāpathavikopanañca ekappahāreneva hoti,
tika-s0403t:818_23: saṅkhārasīsaṃ nirodho”ti paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttesu sattarasasu sīsesu pavattasīsaṃ kilesasīsanti dve sīsāni idhādhippetāni –
tika-s0403t:818_27: Tattha avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0403t:818_31: Yassa cetaṃ sīsadvayaṃ samaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0403t:819_6: arahattamagge cattārīti ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyato imāya
tika-s0403t:819_7: vārasamatāya idaṃ ubhayasīsapariyādānampi samaṃ hotīti imāya vārasamatāya.
tika-s0403t:819_8: Vārasamavuttidāyakena hi maggacittena attano anantaraṃ viya nipphādetabbā paccavekkhaṇavārā ca kilesapariyādānasseva vārāti vattabbataṃ arahati.
tika-s0403t:819_9: “Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti vacanato paccavekkhaṇaparisamāpanena kilesapariyādānaṃ sampāpitaṃ
tika-s0403t:819_10: nāma hotīti imāya vāravuttiyā samatāya kilesapariyādānajīvitapariyādānānaṃ samatā veditabbā.
tika-s0403t:820_0: Āyuno vemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā antarāva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyatīti antarāparinibbāyī.
tika-s0403t:820_4: Āyuvemajjhaṃ upahacca atikkamitvā tattha parinibbāyatīti upahaccaparinibbāyī.
tika-s0403t:820_6: Asaṅkhārena appayogena anussāhena akilamanto tikkhindriyatāya sukheneva parinibbāyatīti asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī.
tika-s0403t:820_10: Sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto dukkhena parinibbāyatīti sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī.
tika-s0403t:820_12: uddhaṃ vā gantvā paṭilabhitabbato uddhamassa maggasotanti uddhaṃbhoto.
tika-s0403t:821_1: Yo hi avihato paṭṭhāya cattāro devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā parinibbāyati,
tika-s0403t:821_3: Ayañhi avihesu kappasahassaṃ vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā atappaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0403t:821_4: tatrāpi dve kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā sudassaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0403t:821_5: tatrāpi cattāri kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā sudassiṃ gacchati,
tika-s0403t:821_6: tatrāpi aṭṭha kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0403t:821_8: Tattha yo avihato paṭṭhāya dutiyaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā devalokaṃ gantvā parinibbāyati,
tika-s0403t:821_12: Yo heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva nibbattitvā parinibbāyati,
tika-s0403t:822_0: Ete pana avihesu uppannasamanantaraāyuvemajjhaṃ appatvāva parinibbāyanavasena tayo antarāparinibbāyino,
tika-s0403t:825_4: Puna dasavasso na hotīti tesaṃ matimattametanti dassetuṃ “so kirā”ti kirasaddaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t:825_6: Tassa nibbīsādibhāvassa viya ninnavādibhāvassa ca icchitattāti dassetuṃ “na kevalañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:825_8: Na idaṃ titthiyānaṃ adhivacanaṃ tesu tannimittassa abhāvā,
tika-s0403t:825_11: Yassa panetaṃ adhivacanaṃ yena ca kāraṇena,
tika-s0403t:826_2: Sikkhāya vā sammadeva ādito paṭṭhāya rakkhaṇaṃ sikkhāsamādānaṃ.
tika-s0403t:826_3: Tañca atthato pūraṇena paricchinnaṃ arakkhaṇe sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato,
tika-s0403t:826_9: Tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccādivasena sammadeva nijjhānaṃ dhammanisāmanāti āha “vipassanāyetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-s0403t:826_13: Taṃ pana sabbaso vīriyassa paribrūhanaṃ hotīti āha “kāyikacetasikassa vīriyassa pūraṇe”ti.
tika-s0403t:826_14: Satiyañceva nipakabhāve cāti satokāritāya ceva sampajānakāritāya ca.
tika-s0403t:831_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame devāyatanabhāvena cittattā lokassa cittīkāraṭṭhānatāya ca cetiyaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0403t:831_8: “Vuddhiyevā”tiādinā vuttamatthaṃ byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ “abhiṇhaṃ asannipatantā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:831_10: Bhijjitvāti vaggabandhato vibhajja visuṃ visuṃ hutvā.
tika-s0403t:832_0: Sannipātabheriyāti sannipātārocanabheriyā. Addhabhuttā vāti sāmibhuttā vā. Osīdamāneti hāyamāne.
tika-s0403t:833_0: Suṅkanti bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā gacchantehi pabbatakhaṇḍanādititthagāmadvārādīsu rājapurisānaṃ dātabbabhāgaṃ.
tika-s0403t:833_4: Idāni apaññattapaññāpanādīsu tappaṭikkhepe ca ādīnavānisaṃse ca vitthārato dassetuṃ “tesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:833_6: Porāṇaṃ vajjidhammanti ettha pubbe kira vajjirājāno “ayaṃ coro”ti ānetvā dassite “gaṇhatha naṃ cora”nti avatvā vinicchayamahāmattānaṃ denti.
tika-s0403t:833_26: Rājā tassa kiriyaṃ tena samānetvā tadanucchavikaṃ daṇḍaṃ karoti.
tika-s0403t:833_27: Iti etaṃ porāṇaṃ vajjidhammaṃ samādāya vattantānaṃ manussā na ujjhāyanti.
tika-s0403t:833_28: Paramparāgatesu aṭṭakulesu jātā agatigamanaviratā aṭṭamahallakapurisā aṭṭakulikā.
tika-s0403t:834_1: Garubhāvaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvāti “ime amhākaṃ garuno”ti tattha garubhāvaṃ paṭi paṭi upaṭṭhapetvā.
tika-s0403t:834_3: Taṃ pana sammānanaṃ tesu nesaṃ attamanatāpubbakanti āha “manena piyāyissantī”ti.
tika-s0403t:836_1: tassa kammassa vipāke vā anavasarova devasopasaggo.
tika-s0403t:836_2: Tasmiṃ pana laddhokāse siyā devatopasaggassa avasaroti āha “anuppannaṃ…pe…
tika-s0403t:836_4: Eteneva anuppannaṃ sukhanti etthāpi attho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t:836_5: Balakāyassa diguṇatiguṇatādassanaṃ paṭibhayabhāvadassananti evamādinā devatānaṃ saṅgāmasīse sahāyatā veditabbā.
tika-s0403t:840_3: Vajjirājānoti “vajjetabbā ime”ti ādito pavattaṃ vacanaṃ upādāya vajjīti laddhanāmā rājāno,
tika-s0403t:840_7: So pana pabhāvo nesaṃ gaṇarājānaṃ mitho sāmaggiyā loke pākaṭo.
tika-s0403t:840_9: Anu anu taṃsamaṅgino bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti anubhāvo,
tika-s0403t:840_11: So pana nesaṃ patāpo hatthiassādivāhanasampattiyā tattha ca subhikkhitabhāvena loke pākaṭo jātoti “etena…pe…
tika-s0403t:840_17: purimasarassa poṅkhapadānugatapoṅkhaṃ itaraṃ saraṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0403t:841_6: Sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā natthi tāya velāya.
tika-s0403t:841_9: Bhedopi idha upāyo evāti vuttaṃ “aññatra mithubhedā”ti.
tika-s0403t:841_11: Idanti “aññatra upalāpanāya aññatra mithubhedā”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:841_13: parihānī”ti imāya bhagavato kathāya upāyaṃ labhitvā.
tika-s0403t:842_1: pāpesīti rājā taṃ attano santikaṃ āgataṃ “kiṃ, ācariya,
tika-s0403t:842_3: So “yathā bho samaṇassa gotamassa vacanaṃ na sakkā vajjī kenaci gahetuṃ,
tika-s0403t:842_4: apica upalāpanāya vā mithubhedena vā sakkā”ti āha.
tika-s0403t:842_5: Tato naṃ rājā “upalāpanāya amhākaṃ hatthiassādayo nassissanti,
tika-s0403t:842_7: kiṃ karomā”ti pucchi. Tena hi, mahārāja,
tika-s0403t:842_8: tumhe vajjī ārabbha parisati kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetha,
tika-s0403t:842_10: attano santakena kasivaṇijjādīni katvā jīvantu ete rājāno”ti vatvā pakkamissāmi.
tika-s0403t:842_12: esa brāhmaṇo vajjī ārabbha pavattaṃ kathaṃ paṭibāhatī”ti vadeyyātha.
tika-s0403t:842_14: tampi gāhāpetvā tumhepi mama dosaṃ āropetvā bandhanatāḷanādīni akatvāva kevalaṃ khuramuṇḍaṃ maṃ katvā nagarā nīharāpetha,
tika-s0403t:842_15: athāhaṃ “mayā te nagare pākāro parikhā ca kāritā,
tika-s0403t:842_17: na cirassaṃ dāni taṃ ujuṃ karissāmī”ti vakkhāmi.
tika-s0403t:843_1: mā tassa gaṅgaṃ uttāretuṃ adatthā”ti āhaṃsu.
tika-s0403t:843_2: Tatra ekaccehi “amhe ārabbha kathitattā kira so evaṃ karotī”ti vutte “tena hi bhaṇe etū”ti vadiṃsu.
tika-s0403t:843_3: So gantvā licchavī disvā “kimāgatatthā”ti pucchito taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
tika-s0403t:843_4: Licchavino “appamattakena nāma evaṃ garuṃ daṇḍaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti vatvā “kiṃ te tatra ṭhānantara”nti pucchiṃsu.
tika-s0403t:843_9: So patiṭṭhitaguṇo hutvā ekadivasaṃ ekaṃ licchaviṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ gantvā “dārakā kasantī”ti pucchi. Āma, kasanti.
tika-s0403t:843_13: Tato tamañño “kiṃ ācariyo āhā”ti pucchitvā tena vuttaṃ –
tika-s0403t:843_14: asaddahanto “na meso yathābhūtaṃ kathetī”ti tena saddhiṃ bhijji.
tika-s0403t:844_0: Brāhmaṇo aparampi ekadivasaṃ ekaṃ licchaviṃ ekamantaṃ netvā “kena byañjanena bhuttosī”ti pucchitvā nivatto.
tika-s0403t:844_1: Tampi añño pucchitvā asaddahanto tatheva bhijji.
tika-s0403t:844_2: Brāhmaṇo aparampi divasaṃ ekaṃ licchaviṃ ekamantaṃ netvā “atiduggatosi kirā”ti pucchi.
tika-s0403t:844_5: Aparampi ekamantaṃ netvā “tvaṃ kira bhīrujātiko”ti pucchi.
tika-s0403t:844_8: Evaṃ aññena akathitameva aññassa kathento tīhi saṃvaccharehi te rājāno aññamaññaṃ bhinditvā yathā dve ekamaggena na gacchanti,
tika-s0403t:844_15: Vesālikā sutvā “rañño gaṅgaṃ uttarituṃ na dassāmā”ti bheriṃ carāpesuṃ.
tika-s0403t:844_16: Te sutvā “gacchantu sūrarājāno”tiādīni vatvā na sannipatiṃsu.
tika-s0403t:844_20: Yathāvivaṭehi dvārehi pavisitvā sabbe anayabyasanaṃ pāpetvā gato.
tika-s0403t:844_22: “rājāpi tameva pesetvā sabbepi bhinditvā gantvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpesī”ti.
tika-s0403t:847_3: Evaṃ saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento “idhāpi cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t:847_4: Tattha tatotiādi disāsu āgatasāsane vuttavacanaṃ vuttakathanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:848_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ bhikkhū viya pācittiyaṃ desāpetabboti paññāpentā.
tika-s0403t:848_2: Tathā akarontāti navaṃ katikavattaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ vā amaddantā dhammavinayato sāsanaṃ dīpentā khuddakampi ca sikkhāpadaṃ asamūhanantā.
tika-s0403t:848_3: Āyasmā mahākassapo viya cāti “suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho,
tika-s0403t:848_5: Gihinopi jānanti ‘idaṃ vo samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtikānaṃ kappati,
tika-s0403t:848_7: Sacepi hi mayaṃ khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanissāma,
tika-s0403t:848_8: bhavissanti vattāro ‘dhūmakālikaṃ samaṇena gotamena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-s0403t:848_16: yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vatteyyā”ti imaṃ tantiṃ ṭhapento āyasmā mahākassapo viya ca.
tika-s0403t:849_2: Bahū rattiyoti pabbajitā hutvā bahū rattiyo jānanti.
tika-s0403t:849_3: Sīlādiguṇesu patiṭṭhāpanameva sāsane pariṇāyakatāti āha “tīsu sikkhāsu pavattentī”ti.
tika-s0403t:849_6: Sārabhūtaṃ dhammapariyāyanti samathavipassanāmaggaphalasampāpanena sāsane sārabhūtaṃ bojjhaṅgakosallaanuttarasītibhāva-
tika-s0403t:849_13: evaṃ te saṅghāṭipattacīvaraṃ dhāretabba”nti ovādaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
