tika-s0403t:850_1: Itareti ye na paccayavasikā na āmisacakkhukā,
tika-s0403t:851_1: Nanu yattha katthacipi taṇhā sāvajjā evāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “gāmantasenāsanesu hī”tiādi.
tika-s0403t:851_2: Tena “anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato”ti ettha vuttapihādayo piya āraññakasenāsanesu sālayatā sevitabbapakkhikā evāti dasseti.
tika-s0403t:852_1: Tena parehi anussāhitānaṃ saraseneva anāgatānaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanaṃ,
tika-s0403t:855_9: Evaṃ saṃsaṭṭhovāti vuttanayena gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya saṃsaṭṭho eva viharati.
tika-s0403t:855_10: Dussīlā pāpicchā nāmāti sayaṃ nissīlā asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya samannāgatattā pāpā lāmakā icchā etesanti pāpicchā.
tika-s0403t:858_2: Tathāpavattavipassanā pana yasmā attanā sahagatasaññāya bhāvitāya bhāvitā eva hoti,
tika-s0403t:858_5: “Etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītaṃ yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”ti āgatavasena panettha dve lokuttarā hontīti veditabbā.
tika-s0403t:858_6: “Virāgo nirodho”ti hi tattha nibbānaṃ vuttanti idha virāgasaññā,
tika-s0403t:863_1: Catutthassa pañcame attano guyhaṃ tassa āvikarotīti attano guyhaṃ nigguhituṃ yuttakathaṃ aññassa akathetvā tasseva ācikkhati.
tika-s0403t:863_2: Tassa guyhaṃ aññesaṃ nācikkhatīti tena kathitaguyhaṃ yathā aññe na jānanti,
tika-s0403t:866_1: Chaṭṭhe piyo ca hoti manāpo cāti kalyāṇamittalakkhaṇaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-s0403t:866_2: Kalyāṇamitto hi saddhāsampanno ca hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno.
tika-s0403t:866_3: Tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa sambodhiṃ kammañca kammaphalañca,
tika-s0403t:866_4: tena sambodhiyā hetubhūtaṃ sattesu hitasukhaṃ na pariccajati.
tika-s0403t:866_5: Sīlasampattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo.
tika-s0403t:866_6: Sutasampattiyā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ gambhīrānaṃ kathānaṃ kattā hoti.
tika-s0403t:866_7: Cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho.
tika-s0403t:866_12: So satiyā kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samannesamāno paññāya sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā
tika-s0403t:866_13: samādhinā tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena satte ahite nisedhetvā hite niyojeti.
tika-s0403t:871_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame yasmā nidassanatthe nipāto tasmā seyyathāpi manussāti yathā manussāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t:871_2: Viseso hotiyeva satipi bāhirassa kāraṇassa abhede ajjhattikassa bhinnattā.
tika-s0403t:871_8: Sukhasamussayato vinipāto etesaṃ atthīti vinipātikā satipi devabhāve dibbasampattiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0403t:871_9: Apāyesu vā gato natthi nipāto etesanti vinipātikā.
tika-s0403t:871_11: Piyaṅkaramātādīnaṃ viyāti piyaṅkaramātā kira yakkhinī paccūsasamaye anuruddhattherassa dhammaṃ sajjhāyato sutvā –
tika-s0403t:873_0: Api dhammapadaṃ vijāniya, paṭipajjema hitāya no siyā.
tika-s0403t:876_0: Evaṃ puttakaṃ saññāpetvā taṃ divasaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ pattā.
tika-s0403t:876_1: Uttaramātā pana bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvāva sotāpannā jātā.
tika-s0403t:877_2: Mahābrahmuno parisāya bhavāti brahmapārisajjā tassa paricārakaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā.
tika-s0403t:877_5: Satipi tesaṃ tividhānampi paṭhamena jhānena gantvā nibbattabhāve jhānassa pana pavattibhedena ayaṃ visesoti
tika-s0403t:877_8: Sā cassa hīnatā chandādīnaṃ hīnatāya veditabbā.
tika-s0403t:877_12: Sā cassa majjhimatā chandādīnaṃ majjhimatāya veditabbā.
tika-s0403t:877_15: Vipphārikataroti brahmapārisajjehi pamāṇato vipulataro sabhāvato uḷārataro ca hoti.
tika-s0403t:877_18: Tassa hi parittābhādīnaṃ parittasubhādīnañca kāye satipi sabhāvavematte ekattavaseneva vavatthapīyatīti “ekattakāyā”tveva te vuccanti.
tika-s0403t:877_20: Sā cassa ukkaṭṭhatā chandādīnaṃ ukkaṭṭhatāya veditabbā.
tika-s0403t:877_24: Idhāpi kappo asaṅkhyeyyakappavaseneva veditabbo paripuṇṇamahākappassa asambhavato.
tika-s0403t:877_28: Na hi tassā sampayuttadhammavasena aññopi koci bhedo atthi.
tika-s0403t:877_29: Evanti iminā nānattakāyā ekattasaññino gahitāti dasseti.
tika-s0403t:878_6: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena ābhassaraggahaṇeneva sabbepi te parittābhāappamāṇābhāpi gahitā.
tika-s0403t:879_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana niccalāya ekagghanāya pabhāya subhoti pariyāyavacananti “subhena okiṇṇā vikiṇṇā”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0403t:879_10: Catutthaviññāṇaṭṭhitimeva bhajanti kāyassa saññāya ca ekarūpattā.
tika-s0403t:880_1: “Na sabbakālikā”ti vatvā tameva asabbakālikattaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “kappasatasahassampī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:880_2: Soḷasakappasahassaccayena uppannānaṃ suddhāvāsabrahmānaṃ parinibbāyanato aññesañca tattha anuppajjanato buddhasuññe loke suññaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t:880_5: Iminā suttena suddhāvāsānaṃ sattāvāsabhāvadīpaneneva viññāṇaṭṭhitibhāvopi dīpito hoti,
tika-s0403t:884_3: jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”ti hi ettha alaṅkāro parikkhāro nāma.
tika-s0403t:884_4: “Sattahi nagaraparikkhārehi suparikkhataṃ hotī”ti ettha parivāro parikkhāro nāma.
tika-s0403t:884_9: Parivāro hi sammādiṭṭhādayo maggadhammā sammāsamādhissa sahajātādipaccayabhāvena parikaraṇato abhisaṅkharaṇato.
tika-s0403t:884_11: Ayaṃ vuccati ariyo sammāsamādhīti ayaṃ sattahi ratanehi parivuto cakkavattī viya sattahi aṅgehi parivuto ariyo sammāsamādhīti vuccati.
tika-s0403t:887_1: Tatiye anuḍahanaṭṭhenāti kāmaṃ āhuneyyaggiādayo tayo aggī brāhmaṇehipi icchitā santi.
tika-s0403t:887_12: Yadaggena ca te puttānaṃ bahūpakāratāya āhuneyyāti,
tika-s0403t:888_2: ajja uposathiko hutvā vihāre sabbarattiṃ dhammassavanaṃ suṇohi,
tika-s0403t:888_3: sahassaṃ te dassāmī”ti vutto dhanalobhena uposathaṃ samādāya vihāraṃ gantvā “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ akutobhaya”nti
tika-s0403t:888_4: sallakkhetvā dhammāsanassa heṭṭhā nipanno sabbarattiṃ niddāyitvā gharaṃ agamāsi.
tika-s0403t:888_12: So tassā vacanaṃ anādiyitvā gacchati eva.
tika-s0403t:888_14: Atha naṃ kujjhitvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ purato tiṭṭhatī”ti pādena paharitvā patitaṃ antaraṃ katvā agamāsi.
tika-s0403t:889_0: Mātā uṭṭhahitvā “mādisāya mātari evarūpaṃ kammaṃ katvā gatassa te gataṭṭhāne sukhaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃsaññī nāma tvaṃ puttā”ti āha.
tika-s0403t:889_1: Tassa nāvaṃ āruyha gacchato sattame divase nāvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0403t:889_2: Atha te manussā “addhā ettha pāpapuggalo atthi,
tika-s0403t:889_5: Te tassa uḷumpaṃ datvā taṃ samudde pakkhipiṃsu.
tika-s0403t:889_6: So ekaṃ dīpaṃ gantvā vimānapetīhi saddhiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto tāhi “purato purato mā agamāsī”ti vuccamānopi
tika-s0403t:889_7: taddiguṇaṃ taddiguṇaṃ sampattiṃ passanto anupubbena khuracakkadharaṃ ekaṃ addasa.
tika-s0403t:889_10: idaṃ tayā piḷandhitaṃ padumaṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti. Na idaṃ, sāmi, padumaṃ,
tika-s0403t:889_13: kiṃ mayā padumaṃ na diṭṭhapubba”nti vatvā “tvaṃ lohitacandanaṃ vilimpitvā piḷandhanaṃ padumapupphaṃ mayhaṃ na dātukāmo”ti āha.
tika-s0403t:889_14: So cintesi “ayampi mayā katasadisaṃ kammaṃ katvā tassa phalaṃ anubhavitukāmo”ti.
tika-s0403t:889_16: re”ti vatvā tassa matthake cakkaṃ khipi.
tika-s0403t:893_3: kassapabuddhakāle sotāpannassa upāsakassa bhariyā aticāraṃ carati.
tika-s0403t:893_4: So taṃ paccakkhato disvā “kasmā evaṃ karosī”ti āha.
tika-s0403t:893_6: ayaṃ me sunakho viluppamāno khādatū”ti vatvā kālakatā kaṇṇamuṇḍakadahe vemānikapetī hutvā nibbattā divā sampattiṃ anubhavati,
tika-s0403t:893_8: Tadā bārāṇasirājā migavaṃ caranto araññaṃ pavisitvā anupubbena kaṇṇamuṇḍakadahaṃ sampatto tāya saddhiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavati.
tika-s0403t:893_9: Sā taṃ vañcetvā rattiṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavati.
tika-s0403t:893_10: So ñatvā “kattha nu kho gacchatī”ti piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gantvā avidūre ṭhito kaṇṇamuṇḍakadahato nikkhamitvā
tika-s0403t:893_11: taṃ “paṭapaṭa”nti khādamānaṃ ekaṃ sunakhaṃ disvā asinā dvidhā chindi,
tika-s0403t:893_19: Sā “evaṃ akatvā kheḷapiṇḍaṃ bhūmiyaṃ niṭṭhubhitvā pādena ghaṃsāhī”ti āha.
tika-s0403t:893_23: yadidaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ bhūmiyaṃ niṭṭhubhitvā pādena ghaṃsanaṃ,
tika-s0403t:894_0: Dakkhiṇāti cattāro paccayā dīyamānā dakkhanti etehi hitasukhānīti,
tika-s0403t:897_1: Catutthe yaññavāṭaṃ sampādetvā mahāyaññaṃ uddissa saviññāṇakāni aviññāṇakāni ca yaññūpakaraṇāni sajjitānīti āha pāḷiyaṃ “mahāyañño upakkhaṭo”ti.
tika-s0403t:897_2: Taṃ upakaraṇaṃ tesaṃ tathāsajjananti āha “upakkhaṭoti paccupaṭṭhito”ti.
tika-s0403t:897_4: Te pana vacchā eva honti, na dammā,
tika-s0403t:897_9: Upavāyatūti upagantvā sarīradarathaṃ nibbāpento saṇhasītalā vāto vāyatu.
tika-s0403t:900_1: Chaṭṭhe nhāruvilekhananti cammaṃ likhantānaṃ cammaṃ likhitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ.
tika-s0403t:903_3: Samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāti pabbajjāmattena samaṇo vā,
tika-s0403t:903_14: Idampi khoti ettha idanti yathāvuttaṃ sādiyanādiṃ khaṇḍādibhāvavasena ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Pi-
tika-s0403t:903_18: yadetaṃ brahmacāripaṭiññassa asatipi dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiyaṃ mātugāmassa ucchādananahāpanasambāhanasādiyanādi.
tika-s0403t:903_19: Idampi ekaṃsena tassa brahmacariyassa khaṇḍādibhāvāpādanato khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampīti.
tika-s0403t:903_20: Evaṃ pana khaṇḍādibhāvāpattiyā so aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati,
tika-s0403t:903_24: Tato cassa na jātiādīhi parimuttīti dassento “ayaṃ vuccatī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t:904_10: Yā kāci vā bhitti porisakā diyaḍḍharatanappamāṇā kuṭṭaṃ,
tika-s0403t:904_27: Methunā virati brahmacariyanti evampettha pāḷivaṇṇanā veditabbā.
tika-s0403t:907_1: Navame “sāhu dāna”nti dānaṃ detīti “dānaṃ nāma sādhu sundara”nti dānaṃ detīti attho.
tika-s0403t:907_2: Dānañhi datvā taṃ paccavekkhantassa pāmojjapītisomanassādayo uppajjanti,
tika-s0403t:907_4: Idāni dānaṃ anukūladhammaparibrūhanena paccanīkadhammavidūrīkaraṇena ca bhāvanācittassa upasobhanāya
tika-s0403t:907_5: ca parikkhārāya ca hotīti “alaṅkārabhūtañceva parivārabhūtañca detī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:907_6: Jhānānāgāmī nāma hoti jhānaṃ nibbattetvā brahmalokūpapannānaṃ ariyānaṃ heṭṭhā anuppajjanato.
tika-s0403t:907_7: Imaṃ pecca paribhuñjissāmīti sāpekkhassa dānaṃ paralokaphalāsāya sātisayāya ca pubbācāravasena uppajjamānāya
tika-s0403t:907_8: anubhavattā taṇhuttaraṃ nāma hotīti āha “paṭhamaṃ taṇhuttariyadāna”nti.
tika-s0403t:907_9: Dānaṃ nāma buddhādīhi pasatthanti garuṃ cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapetvā dātabbattā “dutiyaṃ cittīkāradāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:907_10: Pubbakehi pitupitāmahehi dinnapubbaṃ katapubbaṃ jahāpetuṃ nāma nānucchavikanti attabhāvasabhāgavasena
tika-s0403t:907_14: nārahāmi pacanto apacantānaṃ dānaṃ adātu”nti evaṃsaññī hutvā dento niravasesaṃ katvā detīti āha “catutthaṃ niravasesadāna”nti.
tika-s0403t:907_15: “Yathā tesaṃ pubbakānaṃ isīnaṃ tāni mahāyaññakāni ahesuṃ,
tika-s0403t:907_16: evaṃ me ayaṃ dānaparibhogo bhavissatī”ti evaṃsaññino dānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ arahesu dātabbato “pañcamaṃ dakkhiṇeyyadāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:907_17: “Imaṃ me dānaṃ dadato cittaṃ pasīdatī”tiādinā pītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā dentassa dānaṃ somanassabāhullappattiyā
tika-s0403t:907_18: somanassupacāraṃ nāma hotīti āha “chaṭṭhaṃ somanassupavicāradāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:910_3: Majjhimabhāṇakā pana vadanti “bhagavā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya jetavanato bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto cārikaṃ nikkhami.
tika-s0403t:910_4: Teneva ca akāle nikkhantattā kosalarājādayo vāretuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
tika-s0403t:910_6: Puṇṇāya sammāpaṭipattiṃ paccāsīsanto bhagavā “mama nivattanapaccayā tvaṃ kiṃ karissasī”ti āha.
tika-s0403t:910_8: pabbajīti ettha seṭṭhi “puṇṇāya bhagavā nivattito”ti sutvā taṃ bhujissaṃ katvā dhītuṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
tika-s0403t:910_11: Athassā satthā āraddhavipassakabhāvaṃ ñatvā imaṃ obhāsagāthaṃ vissajjesi –
tika-s0403t:913_0: Sā gāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ patvā abhiññātā sāvikā ahosi. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0403t:919_2: Dutiye atīte attabhāve nibbattakaṃ kammanti “purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā,
tika-s0403t:919_6: cetanā bhavo”ti evamāgataṃ saparikkhāraṃ pañcavidhaṃ kammavaṭṭamāha.
tika-s0403t:919_7: Etarahi me attabhāvo na siyāti viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanāsahitaṃ paccuppannaṃ pañcavidhaṃ vipākavaṭṭamāha.
tika-s0403t:919_11: Taṃ pajahāmīti tappaṭibaddhacchandarāgappahānena tato eva āyatiṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanavasena pajahāmi pariccajāmi.
tika-s0403t:919_18: Ramaṇīyaṃ vā bhūmibhāganti tiṇagumbādirahitaṃ vivittaṃ abbhokāsabhūmibhāgaṃ.
tika-s0403t:922_1: Tatiye vivittāni tādisāni pana pariyantāni atidūrāni hontīti āha “antimapariyantimānī”ti.
tika-s0403t:922_5: Samannāhāre ṭhapayamānoti indriyaṃ samākārena vattento indriyasamataṃ paṭipādento nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t:922_7: satipi saṅkhāranimittāvirahe niccanimittādivirahato “animitto”ti vuccatīti āha “animittanti balavavipassanāsamādhi”nti.
tika-s0403t:925_2: Thaddhamacchariyasadisaṃ hi kucchitaṃ sabbanihīnaṃ natthi sabbakusalānaṃ ādibhūtassa nisedhanato.

tika-s0403t:929_0: Ādinayappavattā viggāhikakathāti “na tvaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāsi,

tika-s0403t:929_14: Tattha sahitaṃ meti mayhaṃ vacanaṃ sahitaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0403t:929_17: Asahitaṃ teti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ asahitaṃ asiliṭṭhaṃ.

tika-s0403t:929_21: Āropito te vādoti mayā tava vāde doso āropito.
tika-s0403t:929_24: Nibbeṭhehi vā sace pahosīti atha sayaṃ pahosi,
tika-s0403t:930_0: Taṇhā sabbaso khīyanti etthāti taṇhāsaṅkhayo, tasmiṃ.
tika-s0403t:930_1: Taṇhāsaṅkhayeti ca idaṃ visaye bhummanti āha “taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0403t:930_4: Sā sāsanacārigocarā paccattaṃ veditabbatoti āha “pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ saṃkhittena desethāti pucchatī”ti.

tika-s0403t:930_8: Na hi paṭividdhassa lokuttaradhammassa dassannaṃ kuppannaṃ nāma atthi.
tika-s0403t:930_9: Accantameva catūhi yogehi khemo etassa atthīti accantayogakkhemī.
tika-s0403t:930_10: Maggabrahmacariyassa vusitattā tassa ca aparihāyanasabhāvattā accantaṃ brahmacārīti accantabrahmacārī.
tika-s0403t:931_1: Sakkāyasabbañhi sandhāya idha “sabbe dhammā”ti vuttaṃ vipassanāvisayassa adhippetattā.

tika-s0403t:931_13: Tatheva tīraṇapariññāyāti iminā aniccādibhāvena nālaṃ abhinivesāyāti nāmarūpassa upasaṃharati,

tika-s0403t:932_19: evaṃ āyatiṃ tehi kilesehi uppādetabbakkhandhānampi pariccāgapaṭinissaggo vattabbo.
tika-s0403t:932_20: Pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo pana magge labbhamānāya ekantakāraṇabhūtāya vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya vasena veditabbo.

tika-s0403t:936_22: Mananīyato manassa vaḍḍhanato ca manāpassāti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t:936_24: etaṃ sukhassa iṭṭhassa vipākassa adhivacanaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-s0403t:936_25: Sukhassetaṃ yadidaṃ puññānīti phalena kāraṇassa abhedopacāraṃ vadati.
tika-s0403t:936_26: Tena katūpacitānaṃ puññānaṃ avassaṃbhāviphalaṃ sutvā appamattena sakkaccaṃ puññāni kattabbānīti puññakiriyāyaṃ niyojeti,

tika-s0403t:937_1: puññavipākaṃ udāharitvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karonto “abhijānāmi kho panāha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0403t:937_18: cittasīsena samādhi vuttoti mettāsamādhiṃ metābrahmavihāraṃ uppādetvā ceva vaḍḍhetvā ca.
tika-s0403t:938_13: Ābhassarūpagoti tattha paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena ābhassarabrahmalokaṃ upagacchāmīti ābhassarūpago homi.
tika-s0403t:938_15: Suññaṃ brahmavimānaṃ upapajjāmīti kassaci sattassa tattha nibbattassa abhāvato suññaṃ yaṃ paṭhamajjhānabhūmisaṅkhātaṃ brahmavimānaṃ ādito nibbattati,
tika-s0403t:939_0: Brahmāti kāmāvacarasattehi visiṭṭhaṭṭhena tathā tathā brūhitaguṇatāya brahmavihārato nibbattanaṭṭhena ca brahmā.
tika-s0403t:939_2: tato eva te abhibhavitvā ṭhitattā abhibhū.
tika-s0403t:939_3: Tehi na kenacipi guṇena abhibhūtoti anabhibhūto.
tika-s0403t:939_6: atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ dassanasamattho abhiññāñāṇena passitabbaṃ passāmīti attho.
tika-s0403t:939_7: Sesabrahmānaṃ iddhipādabhāvanābalena attano cittañca mama vase vattemīti vasavattī homīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:939_8: Tadā kira bodhisatto aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīpi samāno tathā sattahitaṃ attano pāramipūraṇañca olokento tāsu
tika-s0403t:939_9: eva dvīsu jhānabhūmīsu nikanti uppādetvā mettābrahmavihāravasena aparāparaṃ saṃsari.

tika-s0403t:940_1: Tattha sakko ahosinti chattiṃsakkhattuṃ chattiṃsavāre aññattha anupapajjitvā nirantaraṃ sakko devānamindo tāvatiṃsadevarājā ahosiṃ.
tika-s0403t:940_2: Rājā ahosintiādīsu catūhi acchariyadhammehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi ca lokaṃ rañjetīti rājā.

tika-s0403t:940_11: Dhammeneva rajjaṃ labhitvā rājā jātoti dhammarājā,

tika-s0403t:940_13: Tena ca dhammena sakalaṃ lokaṃ rañjetīti dhammarājā.

tika-s0403t:941_8: Caṇḍassa hi rañño balidaṇḍādīhi lokaṃ pīḷayato manussā majjhimajanapadaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbatasamuddatīrakandarādīni nissāya paccante vāsaṃ kappenti.
tika-s0403t:941_9: Atimudukassa rañño corehi sāhasikadhanavilopapīḷitā manussā paccantaṃ pahāya janapadamajjhe vāsaṃ kappenti.
tika-s0403t:941_10: Iti evarūpe rājini janapado thirabhāvaṃ na pāpuṇāti.

tika-s0403t:950_7: Dubbaṇṇova hotīti pakatiyā vaṇṇavāpi alaṅkatappaṭiyattopi mukhavikārādivasena virūpo eva hoti.

tika-s0403t:958_1: Rāgādīsu hi akusalamūlesu ussannesu loko vinassati.
tika-s0403t:958_2: Tathā hi rāge ussannatare agginā vinassati,
tika-s0403t:959_3: Tattha “vassasatasahassamatthake kappuṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhavissatī”tiādinā devatāhi ugghositasaddo kappakolāhalaṃ nāma hoti.

tika-s0403t:960_1: Assāsarahitāti supinake pītapānīyaṃ viya anulittacandanaṃ viya ca assāsavirahitā.
tika-s0403t:961_2: āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe ekamahāvassaṃ vassati.

tika-s0403t:961_8: “Vassasatasahassa accayena kappavuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”tiādinā devatāhi vuttavacanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena manussā
tika-s0403t:961_9: ca bhummadevatā ca saṃvegajātā aññamaññaṃ muducittā hutvā mettādīni puññānī katvā devaloke nibbattanti,
tika-s0403t:962_0: Pañca bījajātānīti mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti pañca bījāni jātāni.
tika-s0403t:962_10: Paccayantarasamavāye visadisuppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato ruhanasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bīja-
tika-s0403t:962_11: saddo tadatthasiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti mūlādito nivattanatthaṃ ekena bīja-
tika-s0403t:966_3: jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”tiādīsu viya alaṅkāravacano parikkhārasaddoti āha “nagarālaṅkārehi alaṅkata”nti.
tika-s0403t:966_7: Suṭṭhu sannisīdāpitāti bhūmiṃ nikhanitvā sammadeva ṭhapitā.
tika-s0403t:967_0: Anupariyāyeti etenāti anupariyāyo, soyeva pathoti anupariyāyapatho, parito pākārassa anuyāyamaggo.
tika-s0403t:968_1: Yena hi payogena puriso hatthino ārohanayoggo hoti,
tika-s0403t:968_2: hatthissa taṃ payogaṃ vidhāyantānaṃ sabbesampetesaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t:968_4: Tattha hatthācariyā nāma ye hatthino hatthārohakānañca sikkhāpakā.
tika-s0403t:968_14: Celena celapaṭākāya yuddhe akanti gacchantīti celakāti āha –
tika-s0403t:968_16: Yathā tathā ṭhite senike brūhakaraṇavasena tato tato calayanti uccālentīti calakā.
tika-s0403t:968_17: Sakuṇagghiādayo viya maṃsapiṇḍaṃ parasenāsamūhaṃ sāhasikamahāyodhatāya chetvā chetvā dayanti uppatitvā gacchantīti piṇḍadāyakā.
tika-s0403t:968_18: Dutiyavikappe piṇḍe dayanti janasammadde uppatantā viya gacchantīti piṇḍadāyakāti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t:968_21: Pakkhandantīti attano vīrasūrabhāvena asajjamānā parasenaṃ anupavisantīti attho.
tika-s0403t:968_23: Ekasūrāti ekākisūrā attano sūrabhāveneva ekākino hutvā yujjhanakā.
tika-s0403t:969_4: Ayaṃ anudhammoti ayaṃ navannaṃ lokuttaradhammānaṃ anulomadhammo.
tika-s0403t:969_6: Saddhā bandhati pātheyyanti saddhā nāmāyaṃ sattassa maraṇavasena mahāpathaṃ saṃvajato mahākantāraṃ paṭipajjato
tika-s0403t:969_14: Issariye hi abhimukhībhūte thalatopi jalatopi bhogā āgacchantiyeva.
tika-s0403t:969_16: Saddhā dutiyā purisassa hotīti purisassa devaloke,
tika-s0403t:969_17: manussaloke ceva nibbānañca gacchantassa saddhā dutiyā hoti,
tika-s0403t:972_2: Tassa tasseva suttageyyādinā bhāsitassa tadaññassa suttapadatthassa bodhakassa saddassa atthakusalatāvasena atthaṃ jānātīti atthaññū.
tika-s0403t:972_3: “Ettakomhi sīlena samādhinā paññāyā”ti evaṃ yathā attano pamāṇajānanavasena attānaṃ jānātīti attaññū.
tika-s0403t:972_5: Niddese pana paṭiggahaṇamattaññutāya eva paribhogādimattaññutā pabodhitā hotīti paṭiggahaṇamattaññutāva dassitā.
tika-s0403t:972_8: ayaṃ kālo yogassa adhigamāyā”ti evaṃ kālaṃ jānātīti kālaññū.
tika-s0403t:972_12: atikkhapaññassa tāvatā kālena tīretuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā dasa vassāni uddesassa kālo,
tika-s0403t:972_17: khattiyaparisādikaṃ manussaparisaṃyeva puna catubbidhaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhavidhaṃ vadanti apare.
tika-s0403t:972_22: vipariyāyato añño asevitabbo”ti sevitabbāsevitabbapuggalaṃ jānātīti puggalaparoparaññū.
tika-s0403t:972_23: Evañhi tesaṃ puggalānaṃ paroparaṃ ukkaṭṭhanihīnataṃ jānāti nāma.
tika-s0403t:975_5: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahāgovindasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ imameva pāḷiṃ āharitvā dassentena paṭhamaṃ paṇḍupalāsataṃ,
tika-s0403t:975_10: te tassa paṇḍupalāsabhāvato paṭṭhāya attamanā honti. Yathāha –
tika-s0403t:976_5: devā tāvatiṃsā tasmiṃ samaye honti ‘paṇḍupalāso dāni pāricchattako, koviḷāro,
tika-s0403t:976_7: Yasmiṃ samaye devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ pāricchattako, koviḷāro,
tika-s0403t:976_14: devā tāvatiṃsā tasmiṃ samaye honti ‘korakajāto dāni pāricchattako koviḷāro,
tika-s0403t:977_3: Ye hi nīlapattakā ativiya khuddakā makuḷā,
tika-s0403t:977_5: Jālakajātoti tehiyeva khuddakamakuḷehi jātajālako sabbaso jālo viya jāto.
tika-s0403t:977_6: Keci pana “jālakajātoti ekajālo viya jāto”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0403t:977_7: Pāricchattako kira khārakaggahaṇakāle sabbatthakameva pallaviko hoti,
tika-s0403t:979_0: Anupharaṇānubhāvoti khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno kittisaddassa yāva brahmalokā anupharaṇasaṅkhāto ānubhāvo.
tika-s0403t:979_1: Pabbajjānissitaṃ hotīti pabbajjāya catupārisuddhisīlampi dassitamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0403t:979_3: Idha pana ubhayato paricchedo heṭṭhā sīlato upari arahattato ca paricchedassa dassitattā.
tika-s0403t:979_4: Tenetaṃ vuttanti tena kāraṇena etaṃ “catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pabbajjānissitaṃ hotī”tiādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:982_2: Sambhāvanattheti “api nāma evaṃ siyā”ti vikappanattho sambhāvanattho.
tika-s0403t:982_3: Evañhi loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hotīti ekameva saṅkhaṃ avatvā aparāya saṅkhāya saddhiṃ vacanaṃ loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ
tika-s0403t:982_4: hoti yathā “dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitānī”ti.
tika-s0403t:982_5: Sammā adhisayitānīti pādādīhi attanā nesaṃ kiñci upaghātaṃ akarontiyā bahivātādiparissayapariharaṇatthaṃ sammadeva upari sayitāni.
tika-s0403t:982_7: Utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyāti tesaṃ allasinehapariyādānatthaṃ attano kāyusmāvasena utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā.
tika-s0403t:982_9: Sammā paribhāvitānīti sammadeva sabbaso kukkuṭavāsanāya vāsitāni.
tika-s0403t:982_11: Ettha ca sammāparisedanaṃ kukkuṭagandhaparibhāvanañca sammāadhisayanasammāparisedananipphattiyā ānubhāvanipphāditanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:982_13: Na hi sammāadhisayanato visuṃ sammāparisedanassa sammāparibhāvanassa ca kāraṇaṃ atthi.
tika-s0403t:982_14: Tena pana saddhiṃyeva itaresaṃ dvinnampi ijjhanato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:983_1: Kiñcāpi “evaṃ aho vata me”tiādinā na icchā uppajjeyya kāraṇassa pana sampāditattā,
tika-s0403t:983_2: atha kho bhabbāva te abhinibbhijjitunti yojanā.
tika-s0403t:983_3: Kasmā bhabbāti āha “te hi yasmā tāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t:983_6: Yathā kapālassa tanutā ālokassa anto paññāyamānassa kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0403t:983_7: tathā kapālassa tanutāya nakhasikhāmukhatuṇḍakānaṃ kharatāya ca allasinehapariyādānaṃ kāraṇavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:983_8: Tasmāti ālokassa anto paññāyamānato sayañca paripākagatattā.
tika-s0403t:984_5: Ñāṇassa hi sabhāvato satinepakkato ca tikkhabhāvo,
tika-s0403t:984_10: Anulomaṭṭhāniyā hi vipassanā gahitagabbhā nāma tadā maggagabbhassa gahitattā.
tika-s0403t:985_3: Gaṇḍaṃ haratīti palagaṇḍoti etena “palena gaṇḍahāro palagaṇḍoti pacchimapade uttarapadalopena niddeso”ti dasseti.
tika-s0403t:985_7: Tena vipassanaṃ anuyuñjantassa puggalassa ajānantasseva āsavānaṃ parikkhayo idha vipassanānisaṃsoti adhippeto.
tika-s0403t:986_7: Pariyāyanaṃ viyāti parito aparāparaṃ yāyanaṃ viya.
tika-s0403t:989_7: Taṃ kiṃ maññathāti taṃ idāni mayā vuccamānatthaṃ kiṃ maññathāti anumatiggahaṇatthaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0403t:990_2: Asucisaṅkassarasamācārassāti aparisuddhatāya asuci hutvā saṅkāya saritabbasamācārassa.
tika-s0403t:990_3: Dussīlo hi kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ asukena kataṃ bhavissatī”ti paresaṃ āsaṅkā hoti.
tika-s0403t:990_4: Kenacideva karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā “kacci nu kho ime mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī”ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro.
tika-s0403t:990_10: Pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā antopūtikassa.
tika-s0403t:994_3: Pabandhānupacchedassa paccayabhāvo idha jīvitassa raso kiccanti adhippetanti āha “sarasaparittatāyapī”ti.
tika-s0403t:994_7: so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti vacanato parittaṃ khaṇaparittatāyapi.
tika-s0403t:994_8: Paramatthato hi atiparitto sattānaṃ jīvitakkhaṇo ekacittakkhaṇappavattimattoyeva.
tika-s0403t:994_9: Yathā nāma rathacakkaṃ pavattamānampi ekeneva nemippadesena pavattati,
tika-s0403t:994_11: evamevaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ tasmiṃ citte niruddhamatte satto niruddhoti vuccati.
tika-s0403t:994_12: Yathāha “atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvittha na jīvati na jīvissati.
tika-s0403t:994_13: Anāgate cittakkhaṇe na jīvittha na jīvati jīvissati.
tika-s0403t:994_14: Paccuppanne cittakkhaṇe na jīvittha jīvati na jīvissati.
tika-s0403t:1001_2: Parittaṃ lahusanti ubhayaṃ panetaṃ appakassa vevacanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:1001_5: Idha pana āyuno adhippetattā rassanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t:1001_6: Mantāyanti karaṇatthe etaṃ bhummavacananti āha “mantāya boddhabbaṃ,
tika-s0403t:1001_10: Paññāya jānitabbanti jānitabbaṃ jīvitassa parittabhāvo bahudukkhādibhāvo.
tika-s0403t:1001_11: Jānitvā ca pana sabbapalibodhe chinditvā kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ,
tika-s0403t:1001_14: appaṃ vā bhiyyo vassasatato upari appaṃ aññaṃ vassasataṃ appatvā vīsaṃ vā tiṃsaṃ vā cattālīsaṃ vā paṇṇāsaṃ vā saṭṭhi vā vassāni jīvati,
tika-s0403t:1001_16: “Asuko hi evaṃ ciraṃ jīvatī”ti tattha tattha gantvā daṭṭhabbo hoti.
tika-s0403t:1006_2: Tatiye vinayalakkhaṇe patiṭṭhito lajjibhāvena vinayalakkhaṇe ṭhito hoti.
tika-s0403t:1006_3: Alajjī hi bahussutopi samāno lābhagarukatāya tantiṃ visaṃvādetvā uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpetvā sāsane mahantaṃ upaddavaṃ karoti,
tika-s0403t:1006_5: Lajjī pana kukkuccako sikkhākāmo jīvitahetupi tantiṃ avisaṃvādetvā dhammameva vinayameva ca dīpeti,
tika-s0403t:1006_8: so vinayaṃ ajahanto avokkamantova lajjibhāvena vinayalakkhaṇe ṭhito hoti patiṭṭhito.
tika-s0403t:1007_0: Asaṃhīroti ettha saṃhīro nāma yo pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā heṭṭhā vā uparito vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno vitthunati vipphandati,
tika-s0403t:1007_5: Yo pana pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā heṭṭhupariyavasena vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno na vitthunati na vipphandati,
tika-s0403t:1007_6: ekekalomaṃ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya “evaṃ mayaṃ vadāma,
tika-s0403t:1007_8: Yamhi pāḷi ca pāḷivinicchayo ca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ agacchanto tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0403t:1007_10: Yasmā pana evarūpo yaṃ yaṃ parena vuccati,
tika-s0403t:1007_12: attanā suvinicchinitaṃ katvā gahitaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ na vissajjeti,
tika-s0403t:1010_3: Satiavippavāse ṭhitoti kammaṭṭhāne satiṃ avijahitvā ṭhito.
tika-s0403t:1010_4: Pesitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya nibbānaṃ pesitacitto tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro.
tika-s0403t:1013_5: Tasmā te tesaṃ samanavasena pavattantīti āha “adhikaraṇāni samentī”tiādi.
tika-s0403t:1013_9: adhikaraṇesu tāva dhammoti vā adhammoti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo,
tika-s0403t:1013_11: Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṃ yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca,
tika-s0403t:1013_16: Yaṃ saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ karaṇaṃ,
tika-s0403t:1014_0: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca.
tika-s0403t:1014_1: Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṃ yasmiṃ vihāre uppannaṃ tasmiṃyeva vā,
tika-s0403t:1014_5: saṅghe vūpasametuṃ asakkonte tattheva ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitaṃ sammati.
tika-s0403t:1014_6: Evaṃ sammamāne ca panetasmiṃ yā saṅghasammukhato dhammasammukhato vinayasammukhatā puggalasammukhatā,
tika-s0403t:1014_8: Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa saṅghasāmaggivasena sammukhibhāvo saṅghasammukhatā.
tika-s0403t:1015_1: atha naṃ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū “na mayaṃ sakkoma vūpasametu”nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti.
tika-s0403t:1015_2: Tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ salākaggāhāpakaṃ sammannati,
tika-s0403t:1015_3: tena guḷhakavivaṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu tīsu salākaggāhakesu aññataravasena salākaṃ gāhāpetvā sannipatitāya
tika-s0403t:1015_4: parisāya dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya yathā te dhammavādino vadanti,
tika-s0403t:1015_5: evaṃ vūpasantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t:1016_0: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
tika-s0403t:1016_3: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā sace kāci āpatti natthi,
tika-s0403t:1016_5: sace atthi ayaṃ nāmettha āpattīti evaṃ vinicchitaṃ vūpasammati.
tika-s0403t:1017_0: Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsitassa sativinayaṃ yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṃ deti,
tika-s0403t:1017_1: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t:1017_2: Dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci anuvādo na ruhati.
tika-s0403t:1017_3: Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena kate assāmaṇake ajjhācāre “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpatti”nti bhikkhūhi codiyamāno “ummattakena me, āvuso,
tika-s0403t:1017_5: nāhaṃ taṃ sarāmī”ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṃ yācati,
tika-s0403t:1017_6: saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṃ deti.
tika-s0403t:1017_7: Tadā sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t:1017_8: Dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati.
tika-s0403t:1017_9: Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññenaññaṃ paṭicarato pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa
tika-s0403t:1017_13: ayamevassa nāsanā bhavissatī”ti maññamāno saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṃ karoti,
tika-s0403t:1017_14: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0403t:1018_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
tika-s0403t:1018_2: Yadā pana ekassa vā bhikkhuno santike saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ deseti,
tika-s0403t:1018_3: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati.
tika-s0403t:1018_4: Tattha sammukhāvinaye tāva yo ca deseti,
tika-s0403t:1019_0: Puggalassa ca gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhato parihāyati.
tika-s0403t:1020_0: Dvepakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhācāraṃ caritvā puna lajjidhamme uppanne
tika-s0403t:1020_2: siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya saṃvatteyyā”ti aññamaññaṃ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṃ disvā yadā bhikkhū tiṇavatthārakakammaṃ karonti,
tika-s0403t:1020_3: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati.
tika-s0403t:1020_4: Tatra hi yattakā hatthapāsūpagatā “na metaṃ khamatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ akatvā “dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamma”nti na ukkoṭenti,
tika-s0403t:1020_6: sabbesaṃ ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṃyuttañca sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0403t:1021_1: Iti imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni yathānurūpaṃ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti.
